name: MC
text: If you’re wanting to get your nails done and relax I wouldn’t recommend Nancy unfortunately, she is very nice but is very rough with your hands. She puts your hands in uncomfortable positions that I’ve never been through before and doesn’t seem to take her time but seems like she’s in a race to get finished. If you get anxious quickly she wouldn’t be the best nail tech for you. Just my personal experience!

name: myriah dishong
text: Nancy is my go too. I love her, she does amazing every time and won’t let me leave until my nails are perfect!

resp.text: It is awesome. Love to see you in love with our service. Come back to see us soon. We have many more fantastic services for you to try.

name: Carlie Guthrie
text: I made an appointment to get a manicure and pedicure. My “manicure” took a total of 7 minutes, gel and everything, she was in such a rush. My nails weren’t even and the gel polish started flaking 3 days later. However, the guy who did my pedicure took his time and did really well. I am overall disappointed with the service and I’m pretty sure the lady that was rushing everyone was the owner. Won’t go back.

name: Caitlyn Benefield
text: I went here for a gel mani and a regular pedi. My gel mani lasted 3 days before chipping and the polish on my toes lasted about 5 days before I had a huge chip on one of my toes. The mani was definitely rushed but the lady who did my pedi did a good job. The polish is a brand I’ve never seen before so I’m assuming it was a cheap quality polish because I’ve never had polish chip this fast before. I would have gone back to have them fix it but I have a very active toddler and the day I went was the first child free day I’ve had in over a year. Very disappointing.

name: Debra Harper
text: Hope always does a great job!  Everyone is so nice and professional.

resp.text: You are very nice. I appreciate your time leaving feedback for our store. See you soon.

name: Miranda Parish
text: I just love Polished and the staff who are amazing. Selena and others got my nails and toes in great shape for my upcoming Jamaica wedding. This place is so laid back and I always have a great time chatting and laughing with everyone there. Thank you all!!!!

name: Kathleen Hamsen
text: Very, very nice. Great service. . I will be back..

resp.text: I appreciate your time leaving a very kind feedback for our store. We are happy to make our customers happy. See you soon.

name: Yesenia Lane
text: Nancy did my pedicure as well as my toddler's. She did a great job and took her time. She even took time to help me select another nail polish color other than my norm. Really love the color. My biggest disappointment was the lady who did my manicure and nail polish on my hands. She painted half my nails and did a poor job. She was with me a maximum of maybe 5 mins. When I asked for it to be repainted all she gave was attitude. She did not want to repaint them. Even the repainting was not good. Nail polish is still on my skin, you can tell where the base coat is and the nail polish is. Her last comment to me was that I'm going to ruin them and if I do, then I as might as well never came into get a manicure. Very rude lady. Not sure how she is still employed there.

name: Taylor Goodrich
text: I scheduled an appointment for 3:00 and when I got there I was told I had to wait another 20 minutes to be serviced. The man that did my sns was very rude towards me when I asked him politely to cut my nails a little shorter. He rushed my nails and when he dried them a bunch of small bubbles formed in the polish. My nails look horrible. Will not be going back.

name: Maureen Henson
text: She rushed through my pedicure, did not file my nails at all, only clipped them. The nails were not  completely covered with the polish. Worst pedicure I’ve ever had.

name: Cintia Saez
text: So much fun! All 15 girls got their nails done, the staff was very friendly and patient with all of us.  Thank you, great job!!!

resp.text: You are very welcome here. Putting a smile on your face is our job. Glad to have you come back with us soon.

name: marissa hart
text: I would not recommend this salon to anyone ever. They rushed me in, hardly let me pick out a color then when I showed my nail tech a picture of what I wanted to achieve she did not pay attention, she drilled my nails so hard and fast that my fingers physically hurt and I had to tell her to just stop. She got frustrated with me because she could not perform what I wanted but did not want to admit that and then just passed me onto someone else who readily admitted they do not have the color I wanted and could not do what I was asking for. I had to take the current polish and tips that weren't finished, the first lady put on my nails off and make them look somewhat decent to go back out. I WILL NEVER GO HERE AGAIN!!!!! If I could give a -5 Stars I  most defiantly would.

name: Marty McArthur
text:
Someone checked my temperature (forehead) before I entered. Each manicurist's table is outfitted with a plexiglass shield between the manicurist and the customer. Everyone was masked.
I had another excellent gel manicure by Krista. She was professional, very attentive to detail, and pleasant to chat with. She didn't cut any corners or hurry but was still efficient. I always request either her or Ashley when I make an appointment!

resp.text: You are so sweet. It was great to have you as our customer. Hope to see you soon.

name: LaToya Powers
text: Enjoyed my visit here and my nail tech was on point i love my nails!!!!!

resp.text: You are so sweet. It was great to have you as our customer. Hope to see you soon.

Noticed one of her clients came in to get her feet done, she realized she arrived and literally did my nails within 15 minutes. Didnt check if they all were the same lengh. 3 of them are not straight. Love this place but will not allow her to my nails again.

name: Amy Makepeace Petri
text:
My friend and I came by with an hour before close. I called on our way and they insisted we come by, they have time for us. We ended up waiting for about as long as my actual pedicure took. I chose the $36 session and have gotten a better service with the $25 choice from elsewhere. The place had a 100 rating, not sure how that’s possible. The chairs were dingy and run down, massage was unsatisfactory.

I even brought my own polish. They insisted having time for a manicure so I had one. I paid $30 for gel color that I didn’t even like that much.

Rushed job, little massage during pedicure, manicure just ok. I guess that’s what I get for not going to my regular place and coming in before closing time.

text: Always clean, accommodating, relaxing and quick. Good place for inexpensive Mani/Pedis.

text: Super fast service, total bonus! Great people and nice atmosphere. Plan to go back soon. Tiny bit overpriced, buuuut, we were willing to pay for the service and happy with the outcome, so you decide ;)

name: BOBBY LEIBFREID
text:
Totally dissatisfied! Went in to get chrome pedicure and fill...looks like a child did it. They have no idea how to properly apply chrome powder. So $113.00 down the drain!! Never going back! Rush Rush Rush....left with silver chrome powder all over me. Hopefully they will watch a video of proper application of chrome powder. I am a licenced cosmetologist with a nail specialty to boot!! Take your money elsewhere! Update..went in to speak to owner about it and hes too mad about the review I gave to make it right..no offer or refund..he  Said he would have preferred that I came back in and let them fix it before I gave a review but obviously he doesn't understand how reviews work.What a joke! They dont even display proper licences for workers! Reporting to cosmetology board!  I suggested that his employees watch a YouTube video for proper application of Chrome powder you do not put it on with your finger...duhhhhh
Went back to talk to owner and he was RUDE and said he would have fixed it if I had not kedt a bad review! Obviously this guy has no idea how reviews work!! Karma is on them.. take your money somewhere that wont rush your services or treat you like pond scumb!

Website advertises 'professional beauty service,' free wifi, and complimentary wine and soda... Ladies were NOT professional at all.  When my friend asked about the wifi password, the lady who gave it to her was not clear and mumbled it 2 or 3 times before my friend just gave up.  And, we were NEVER offered a drink.  She nor I will ever return.

Scheduling was even very easy and they were able to get me in the following week. Thank you so much and I will be coming back!

text: Alexandria did a great job on me. I feel much better and booked another appointment. I highly recommend them!

name: Brandon Thompson
text: If you yearn for the days of customer service, then LumaLife Therapy is the massage and wellness center for you.  Upon arrival I was greeted by courteous staff in a cozy atmosphere that promoted relaxation.  In addition to traditional massage therapy the clinic offers modern services such as cupping, wellness coaching, and tailored health services.  The prices are reasonable, so much that its easy to be a return customer.  A massage shouldn't have to mean it's a special occasion, and with LumaLife Therapy it doesn't have to be.

resp.text: THANK YOU!!!

name: Rebecca Johnson
text:
So unprofessional. I cannot believe this place has so many 5 star reviews. They did not gove me a pleasant experience and I did not even receive a massage. I scheduled an appointment for a Massage using Groupon on a Saturday in
March. Later I realized I had a scheduling conflict so I rescheduled for a different day. When I came in they had it scheduled for next month on the same day. I remember distinctly scheduling my appointment for this day this month because I TOOK THE DAY OFF for this appointment. I would not have scheduled an appointment incorrectly when I was specifically scheduling it for the day I asked off. So when I arrived they said that I could reschedule. So I tried to schedule it for a day I’m off so I don’t have to ask off again and apparently Saturday’s are only for members! How did I first schedule my appointment for a Saturday then? I’m not a member but I still had it scheduled! Please give me an explanation for this. However, Groupon helped me with my issue and allowed me to trade in my voucher. If I have any advice for anyone thinking about using this company. Don’t.

name: Joan Marie Stewart
text: The Massage Therapists at LumaLife are extremely well trained!  After my recent 90 minute massage, my neck and back had never felt looser!  I stood taller. The massages are truly therapeutic.  I was so relaxed that I wished someone could have driven me home!  The massage table is extremely comfortable - the bedding adds so much to your massage.  The spa is very private, super clean and relaxing.  If you want to really treat your body and mind with relaxation and rejuvenation, then you need to rely on LumaLife for your massages.  Simply a cut way above and I have had massages all over the world and at world class spas and hotels.  At LumaLife, you are relying on true professionals who care about your massage making a difference for your body and mind.

name: Ilka Porter
text: Amazing! Liz is the best. Hands down, the best. You'll never go to anyone else again. Update: Alex and Kallie are amazing too. Very attentive! I have a monthly membership and it's the best thing I've ever done for myself. And take some time to slow down and take advantage of the quiet room.

text: Amazing experience, best kept secret in Birmingham, Mrs. Gloria is fantastic in her Kraft of total body healing. Good health is our greatest commodity, the body our temple.  Thank you for choosing Totally You and I look forward to serving you and your sister again.
Ms. Gloria

name: Art Schultz
text: My wife and I were patients of the Dr. for about eleven years prior to her absents due to illness.  During that time, she was very professional, truly concerned for our health and well being and never overbooked resulting in practically no waits and prompt attention. We moved during her absents but would love to have her back as our primay card physician.

name: Sara W
text: Dr. Alexandra is fantastic. She is honest and straight forward with concerns of your health. Some people don't know how to take her, but it's how she gets your attention.

name: JD Guess?
text: She was filling in for my regular Dr while she was on leave in Bay Minette. First thing she wants to start messing with the meds I'm on. Tells me not to drink my couple of beer, warns me it will show up on the blood test she wants me to get{extra trip } . Refuses to fill a refill I call in for - says I have to make an appointment. I was just in 4 weeks earlier. Sorry Dr Sweet(my regular MD) I'm going back to the Dr I left 8yrs ago. Even though its an hour drive each way. One star because  that's the least I can give.

name: Stuart Baumann
text: Dr. Alexander staff "Caitlyn" is terrible. My 8:20am appointment-I always schedule appointments to be first in the morning or first in the afternoon. Caitlyn arrived to work at 8:20 then calls me in at 8:40 delaying everyone else's appt. that morning. I know this because my wife's appt. was shortly after mine and she was delayed a lot more than 20 minutes caused by Caitlyn arriving late. On top of this, Caitlyn did not send my prescription to my pharmacist. I left multiple messages with Caitlyn asking her to send my prescription. After close to 2 months I finally had to talk to Barbara (other doctor's stall) to get this sent to my pharmacist. Kudos for Barbara. Not so much for Caitlyn.

name: meyber santos
text:
She kinda of ruin doesn't even introduced herself. Does not even put numb cream as Standard procedure for Any treatment in your face.

I been to different dermatologist around the United States and by far this my worst experience in my life.

Over charge by 60 percent by making you put deposit to hold for your appoint in which they never intend to return. As they add more to the cost.

Please do yourself favorite go some where else.  I read the bad comments before coming and they right on.

name: Linde Lynn
text: I took my elderly mother to this primary care practice (Gulf Coast Med Spa / Baldwin Primary Care) off and on for over 5 years. Although she primarily had appointments with 3 different PAs that worked there during those years, she did see Dr. Alexander for a scalp lesion. We never had to wait long, my mother got very good care from the PAs, and a biopsy of the scalp lesion was benign (injury due to repeated scratching). I was not the patient, but as an educated, interested family member, I was very pleased with the care she got at this practice. The facial that you had booked online was for the ultimate facial which nothing but our relaxing facial. Our skin therapist should had recommended our acne management facial for extractions and focusing up on clearing the skin. We do hope that you give us another chance when you come back in town.

name: Jen Boyd
text:
I heard about JSB&M upcoming business via social media and the news. I was so excited, because it's "FUBU." I knew for a fact the next time I visit home (Alabama, I live in Florida) I will be patronizing the business.

From the moment I walked through the door I was greeted and the atmosphere was so warm and welcoming. I was amazed to see a nail technician and a hair styles working. It was an amazing feeling to see other small businesses merchandise being supported and sold in JSB&M also.

I have been to many beauty supply stores, but I have NEVER seen one like J. Stew's. Me knowing and understand like many upcoming businesses it takes time to grown. She did not have everything I wanted, but she did have everything I needed. The prices are beyond reasonable, the staff is very friendly and professional and I left out knowing and feeling that I am in the process of witnessing the start of something amazing. I wish the owner so much success in her business endeavors. I pray she's able to have stores beyond her expectations and continue to change the lives of many in our community.

If you have not been, I urge you to go and support. Also if they don't have it, they can work on getting it!!! At this point I'll have to figure out a way to order online with JSB&M. They have my full support!!!

I was so excited that I called Tammy right away and told her - THIS REALLY WORKS! I LOVED what it did for my skin and have never experienced a result of that magnitude and so quick!!!

I have ordered again! Thank you Tammy for your passion, support, knowledge and for making a difference on my journey to looking my very best!

Cristina

text: Had a girls day here while visiting Gulf Shores. Couldn’t be more pleased. Received a facial, massage, and pedicure for an amazing price. The staff is extremely professional and nice. Very clean. We will be back here for our next girls trip. Definitely worth it

name: Evren Kozanlioglu
text: These ladies are always so sweet and do a great job. Thank you ladies!

name: derek vinson
text: Went in to get a massage and Brian and Kelly were amazing.  One of the best massages and friendliest group of people I have had the pleasure to meet in the area

name: Brandon Karl
text: Horrible. Keep your politics out of your business

name: Elaine Harper
text: Very talented professionals at CC'S Day Spa and Salon are always accommodating and most efficient. I recommend and refer my brides to them and have never had a complaint!!!!  Also, my husband and I use their services and are very happy with our results. The picture shows a bride whose hair and make up was done at CC'S.

name: Maple Goodwin
text: Relaxing, affordable and fantastic service.

name: Kati Roberson
text: They did my makeup for my wedding and WOW!!! Perfection! Airbrushed - I received SOO many compliments. It stayed on for 24 hours and looked amazing in photos. Highly recommend!!!!! So worth it!!!

name: Jessie Williams
text: I could not offer higher praise for CC's Salon & Day Spa! They took care of all my wedding day hair and nail needs for myself, my mom and all of my bridesmaids! Not only did we all look AMAZING, but we had such a fun, relaxing experience and thoroughly enjoyed our time here. We will be back!! Thanks so much CC's for your amazing service and skills!

name: Tina Cerne
text: Shannon did an amazing job with my hair. My hair was three different colors from a bad experience at another salon. She was professional, and recommended what we needed to do to fix my hair. I am incredibly happy with my new look. I look forward to my next visit, and trying out some of their other spa offers.

name: David Drennan
text: Good enough for a massage!

name: Jenna Stone
text: I had a therapeutic massage with Valerie on Saturday and it was the best massage I’ve ever had in my life!!  I get them regularly because I suffer from tension in my neck and shoulders causing tension headaches.   Valerie was very professional and listened to my concerns. I’ve never felt better leaving an appointment and I can’t wait to visit the area again so I can book another massage with her!  Valerie truly has miracle hands!!  The salon/spa was very welcoming and clean.  I enjoyed browsing the cute selection of clothes and jewelry while I waited.  I can’t wait to go back!!!  Thank you Valerie!!

name: Terri Paxton
text: Laura did an amazing job on my hair for my wedding. I was from out of town and selected the salon online. I was over the top pleased with the accommodations they made for me and of how beautiful my hair turned out. I highly recommend both the salon and Laura. Thank you so much for helping me pull off my special day.

name: Moonchild Jess
text: They were very nice upon arrival and pretended like they would squeeze us in at a later time. They waited for a whole hour then called and cancelled our reservation! It caused us to not have time to go anywhere else to get hair and nails done! That is the worst customer service I have ever experienced!

name: Harsh Gandhi
text: It is the best hair salon in the whole world... Employees are very talented and professional..!! And most importantly they care about their customers..!!

name: Lisa Fisher
text:
Laura did a great job on my hair for my wedding. I showed her a picture and it turned out perfect! Very friendly! Highly recommend!
Thank you Laura!

name: Cat Rude
text: I got an excellent one hour massage from Brenda! Lisa was kind and upbeat on the phone. She got three of us scheduled for a girls day within one day and called me back to confirm within an hour! They have a really cute salon that’s reasonably priced and has a really sweet, fun selection.

name: Shelli Anderson
text: These ladies were fantastic.  I brought my 79 year old mom for a day of pampering while on what is likely to be her last beach vacation.  Thank you so much for making us a special day with great memories.   My sister and Aunt totally are jealous and planning their day later this week too!  Highly recommend this salon and we had many services between Mom & I.  Waxing, massage therapist was one of the best, pedicures and a fantastic cut and color on Mom.  Thank you again ladies.  You are amazing!

name: Joan Burke
text: Was shocked at the price. I am originally from Atlanta and go back there regularly to visit my children and grandchildren. I usually have my hair done while I am there. However, one time I needed to have my roots touched up. I didn’t ask price beforehand (my bad) and was shocked when I checked out and the price was $80. I have never paid more than $55 at assorted salons in Atlanta. When the personnel at this salon came to our neighborhood (Peninsula) for an event, I was impressed and that is the reason I went there. However, I do not believe a simple root touch-up should cost this much. I won’t be back.

name: Shelia McKee
text: Very nice Experience. AJ you did a wonderful Facial. And you are so Sweet. Valerie I can say WOW to you The best massage I've ever had. Thank you Ladies

name: Shopgirl18
text: Looking for a great massage then call Valerie.  She is friendly and can work miracles with stressed necks and shoulders! Very nice facility and very clean .Easy to reach in the middle of Gulf Shores.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the great review we enjoyed your visit and hope to see you soon

name: Christian Henslee
text: This was my first time at a salon and I could really see a difference between the two! The staff was really tight knit and provided a great atmosphere. She was a saving grace regarding my hair for our family Thanksgiving pictures! She even kept my Charlie Brown style scar hidden just perfectly, which is no easy feat. I'd recommend this place to anyone who comes down here! Thank you again!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words Christian! We are like family here at the salon and we want our costumers to feel the same, we try hard to provide a great experience for all :)

name: TONYA Medina
text: High class very expensive. They sell clothes shoes jewelry.  They also do massages. I was scared to ask how much. But Beth was nice and cut my hair.

text:
This is the best salon in town!  Great prices. I always get the best service and everyone is so friendly.  Cindy always helps me and works around my schedule.  I never leave disappointed. Always get a compliment on color and cut.
The first salon that I use steadily and will always recommend - to everyone.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Julie Cottrell
text: These ladies are too shelf! My step daughter wanted electric lizard (lime green) hair. And they nailed it!! Nails were done, massage and facial.... best spa day

resp.text: Thank you so much we really appreciate your kindness and hope to see you again

name: Sandra Griffin
text: Got a GREAT facial from AJ,sooo relaxing!!! Then Shannon worked miracles with my hair and nails!! I highly recommend CCs,the ladies were so sweet and accommodating

name: Jess Stewart
text: Our family was on vacation and today my husband was treating me to a spa day for our anniversary. After a spa in Orange Beach booked me the wrong services and never called to inform me that they were unable to offer a service they personally confirmed two days prior, I was very disappointed, to say the least. This spa squeezed me in last minute and was so very kind and accommodating. Great Swedish massage! Thank you for a great experience!

resp.text: Thank you for your review Jess. We are so happy that we could turn your day around and give you exactly want you wanted. Hope to see you again!

name: Amber Treuting
text: My mom and I had the most relaxing and pleasant experience here. The staff is so welcoming and up to date on the latest trends. I had my first experience with dipped nails and they are amazing!!

name: Liz T
text: Hands down the BEST Hair Salon in Gulf Shores! Cindy was AWESOME! Extremely professional, AMAZING at what she does!  I have really thick, poofy, hard to deal with hair, and she thinned it, layered it, and gave me a haircut better than I've ever had in my LIFE!  Thought I've had good cuts before, buy now I know what a good cut is and feels like!  I will get my hair done here forever!  Thanks Cindy!  If I could give you 10 stars I would!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review! You are an amazing client and we appreciate you Liz.

name: Janet Plante
text: Great experience! Everyone was so kind and pleasant. Very clean and professional...reasonable pricing.Received a one hour swedish massage from Brenda...my first professional massage ever. I'm hooked!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review we hope to see you again real soon.

name: Alisha Park
text: I got my hair and makeup done for my beach wedding. My hair was nothing like the pictures I showed for reference.  I had a hair piece that was supposed to be on like a headband and she put it on like a tiara. My hair wasn't smoothed out at all and was hairspray ed frizzy.  My makeup was so drastic and I felt like I was going to a pageant and not my wedding day. I actually wanted to cry when I saw myself in the mirror but did not have time to have anything redone. She didn't even let me pick my colors for my eye shadow. I wanted natural. I also paid extra to have the airbrush and I had so much makeup caked on that it showed lines on my face that I didn't even know I had. I would've been better off and felt more beautiful had I just done it myself and not wasted  $150. I went back and wiped half of my makeup off and tried to fix my hair the best I could.  I'm so disappointed because I only wanted to have the ceremony for the picutres and I won't even want to look at them.

name: Sylvia Howland
text: CiCi was very professional and the first hair stylist who knows how to cut & style hair in Foley. Orange Bch. Gulf Shores Al. I have gone to over 12 salon's. Have been living in this area for over 35 yrs., so I think I have been around. Everyone loves my hair. Thanks again CiCi. Hope to see you soon and bringing a new client.

name: Jamie Dickerson
text: Wonderful experience. The staff was so friendly and inviting. The massage therapist Victoria was amazing. Will definitely go back!

On vacation, visited this spa.  We had everything from nails, facial, and massages.  Everyone was

Elaine
Gulf Shores Wedding Chapel

A Beach Wedding AL

name: Logan Moore
text:
Please note that this is under my sons name. Not sure why and can't get it to change. 🙁
We were visiting in GS for the week and called to see if there was an appt available on the day we called. We were simply told. NO. No offer to see if we were interested in another appt, simply NO. No the best business tactic. Just an opinion.

resp.text: We are so sorry that you did not get good customer service I the owner agree with you and we have taken care of the problem and I want to thank you for bringing it to my attention. CC Salon.

text: If you live or vacation in Gulf Shores, CC’s Salon and Day Spa is a must visit.. you won’t be disappointed! An excellent massage by Valorie Rossi, who took time prior to the massage to learn of my needs, and any medical or other issues that could be addressed to ensure the massage my needs were met. Following the massage, Shannon Ryck provided a great haircut, making certain to ask my specific wishes for the cut. I was most pleased with the entire experience.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the great review we enjoyed your visit and hope to see you soon

name: Karen Grant
text: Great experience from start to finish. Perfect bridal hair and makeup!!!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the great reviews

name: Keleigh Asbury
text: Laura was lovely, and the rest of the staff were very friendly. I’m picky about waxing but my brows look marvelous. A great find in AL!

name: Jacqueline Frame
text: I would give 0 stars if possible. We showed up 15 min before our appointment and filled out our paperwork. The ladies were talking around us about unprofessional subjects. Came time for our appointment and no body said anything. Finally 10 min after our appointment time I asked how much longer it was going to be as we had reservations to go to afterwards. With out apology they went to go check and came back saying they didn't know because one massage client made them late. 25 min past our appointment time we had to leave. They asked if we wanted to reschedule and I explained to them that this experience had left a bad taste in my mouth. They responded by saying these things happen. I do not suggest them as they are overpriced for the service they offer.

name: Chris Denson
text: Great medical massage this a.m. helped relieve ongoing pain....

name: Mamaking 777
text: Sweetest ppl ever!!! We traveled 12 hours to get to gulf shores for our 30th wedding Anniversary. We were running almost an hour late due to traffic, they were so kind and actually waited for us after hours. Kaitlin & Valarie gave us an hour-long couples massage and let me tell you, these girls were absolutely AMAZING. Valarie even got rid of my sciatica that I've had for weeks!! Thanks so much girls.... May God bless you!!

name: arlene meyer
text: \   what a wonderful place the staff is so helpful and pleasant to be with the service is impeccable

name: mason munoz
text: Great massage and get complements on my haircut all the time.

name: Crystal Fletcher
text: We booked a spa day for a group of 5. When I booked the day I was assured that no one would be sitting waiting on the others and that everyone would be receiving a service at the same time. Things started off fine but went south after the first round. One of our group sat for 1 hour waiting and we wound up waiting for the last lady for an additional hour. Really a matter of time management.  As far the services we were pleased. The massage was phenomenal.  We were asked where she needed to concentrate and she did a great job. Very relaxing!  The facial was wonderful as well. It was really one of the best I have received. The mani/pedi could have been better. Polish was sloppy and and cuticles were not trimmed on the pedi.  However, the ladies were friendly and it was overall and pleasant experience.

resp.text: Thank you for the review Crystal and for being so honest about your experience. The only way we can get better and always be growing and perfecting everyone's experience here is to have honest people like yourself. So far we have hired a receptionist so we will have better time management and we are practicing more on pedicures so we can be more comfortable getting the job done right. We would love to see you again next time you visit and maybe you can get another pedicure and let us know if we have gotten better. I'm glad you had an overall pleasant experience, That is our goal for everyone to have.

name: Therese Ann
text: I went in to have my hair professionally done and honestly...I could have done it myself as horrible as it turned out. I am embarrassed to say I paid $180 plus $30 tip (out of courtesy) to treat myself. It's very uneven and burndt. I have never had my hair turn out this color. I feel if you scew up someone's hair YOU SHOULDNT CHARGE THEM. I went in with healthy hair, left with burnt uneven hair. I'm disgusted. I GUESS YOU DON'T ALWAYS GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR. I WILL NEVER USE THEM AGAIN.

name: debbie Adams
text: Thank you Beth for my great color and cut

name: Denny Shirley Owens
text: Cindy has been my stylist for several years.  I’m always pleased with her work, and the professional, pleasant, and friendly atmosphere of her salon.

name: Mollie Cole
text: I chose this place because of the reviews on Google but I would NOT recommend this salon to anyone for their wedding or bridal party. I was told over the phone that they would not quote me prices because I had little girls getting their hair done so if it was simple it wouldn't cost as much. I also had to give them $100 deposit to hold the reservation (completely understandable until I arrived). One of the stylists was very nice but appeared to be more of an apprentice and had to keep asking for help to do the hair of the 2 younger girls. We were still charged full price for these styles ($75 for a 6 year old and 8 year old). One was a bun and did NOT look good and it didn't even resemble the picture we used. Again, she was very nice but the hair was not close to what we asked for. Two of the styles were supposed to be beachy waves and instead we left with weird curls and half done hair. Both charged $55 and took almost no time making it look even decent. They asked me to send pictures ahead of time for my hair and then clearly had not looked at them. I had to ask multiple times about fixing it (it was for my wedding after all) and while my stylist was nice enough to fix it she did seem VERY annoyed. I left with ok hair that I could live with (not exactly what I had in mind as a bride). And somehow I was charged the same price for mine as the 6 year old flower girl. The owner was pretty rude - she told my sister that she could put the little girls in a room and close the door while we waited. The same girls she charged full price updos for. I guess they were good enough to pay but not make noise in her salon? The last complaint was that the stylists kept stopping with our party to help a mom and bride that were also in the salon. Overall very bad hair and bad experience.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback we appreciate the negative review as well as the great reviews . We strive to help everyone have a pleasant experience. We have a great salon and lots of talent.it is unfortunate you didn't have that experience.moving forward we will take your comments and grow from them. C.C Salon

name: marissa rinaldi
text: Great little boutique with the cutest clothes at a wonderful price!!!!

resp.text: Thanks so much for coming in we appreciate your business

name: Kathy Milano

name: Katelin Howell
text: This place is amazing. The atmosphere is both relaxing and friendly. Each hair dresser has their own door so it always feels like a private one on one experience. They are constantly striving to create a better experience with varying services from nails to waxes and massages. This is a reasonably priced spa experience. This is a one stop beauty salon and they will take care of you from head to toe. The lovely ladies of this salon are very experienced and your hair will always turn out amazing. I always leave here feeling rejuvenated and beautiful. I recommend Pure Beauty to everyone I know.

text: Love this place! have been looking for a nice clean and professional place for waxing, facials, and massages. I ran across Spa Elia by browsing the web and I did more research and went in for a consultation...let’s just say... they have gained a customer for years to come for sure!

name: Lisa Silver
text:
Spa Elia was such a wonderful experience. The atmosphere is so very relaxing. The staff was so kind and helpful. I was treated to a very good massage as a gift on my first visit. Brittany was very good. As a second gift from my wonderful sister, who lives in North Carolina, I was once again treated to a second treatment, a facial. Cornelia was wonderful and very sensitive to me and my experience while I was there. I cannot say enough about their attention to detail and customer service. I will definitely be scheduling my own service soon.

As a side note, unbeknownst to me all of this was arranged and coordinated by my sister remotely following a life changing and very fast move from out of state. From what I understand from my sister, the spa was very kind in working with her on every little detail. What a terrific experience for us all.

Thank you Spa Elia!

text: Love the Therapy massage ❤️ Super peaceful and cleaning atmosphere 🥰😁 Definitely recommend it to anyone!👍

Lorrie was very attentive to my needs and even provided a robe and slippers for my trip to get my facial. There was a smooth transition. Michelle did my facial and Ive had a facial before, but not like this! She was very thorough and even took the time to massage my hands and feet as well. I will never go to another spa ever in Montgomery area other than Spa Elia. Pleased with the customer service. I even got to use my Spa Finder gift card. Best birthday gift.

text:
I have been going to Cabana Wax since November 2020. The first two times I saw one lady, but she no longer works there. I now have been with Kristen since then and it was a blessing in disguise! She is AMAZING makes my appointments feel super comfortable. She’s a sweet lady, gives you all the information you need and does a wonderful job. I always go for a Brazilian and have started adding underarm waxing the past couple of visits. Basically a monthly expense I don’t mind shelling money out for!

Also, I have to say the receptionist, Sarah, is wonderful! Super sweet and very nice!

text: Kristen is the best!! She made feel very comfortable on my first time. So much so I just keep coming back!😀

name: Jessica Sales
text: Omg today 5/22/2021 I had services with Maddie!!! She is so bomb she is very and I mean very professional, kind spirited, very informative, and really eased me throughout the entire process today was my very first time getting waxed ( I know right) and she told me step by step  the process and why she is using hard wax instead of strips, and when I tell you all I didn’t cry, scream, and the pain was minimal and bearable I even let her wax my under arms 😊 the process was quick and we still had time to chat and share laughs. When receiving service this is what it’s all about she has definitely gained a forever customer and friend I will highly recommend Cabana Wax & Maddie to my colleagues, family, and friends. She’s definitely sending me off right for my upcoming mommy makeover and might I add the receptionist was amazing and all smiles and the property was very clean 😊 But parking was crazy 🥴 but overall experience 10/10 y’all check out Maddie and tell her Jessica sent you’ll 🥰

text: Kristen is the best. She really helps calm you and keep you comfortable. I’ve been coming here for a year now and every time it’s a great experience.

I have had another staff there (can’t think of her name but I had her every time) and she did an excellent job and was super nice and had great conversation as well. But Maddie…….yep, she’s my homegirl now. She’s stuck with me. The price is right.  The atmosphere is nice and clean. The people are nice. Go there PERIOD! Ok bye✌🏾

text: This was my first time ever getting waxed so I was super nervous but Maddie was super cool and talked to me the whole time and even walked me through the process! All of my nerves were gone a minute in and she did a phenomenal job! 10/10 would recommend! Amazing

name: Kayla Brown
text: Cabana wax is the go to place for body waxing! The atmosphere is inviting and the staff is so friendly. Kristen is a fantastic and efficient waxer!

name: Mary Busby
text:
I went for my first wax ever here.  I was nervous, which means I was extra chatty. But Kristen was amazing! She talked me through and made me feel wayyy more comfortable than I imagined I ever could be doing this and it was never awkward.

She used a mixture of soft and hard wax and went back to clean up any strays that were too short for the wax to grab.

I’ve had bikini waxes before and even that wasn’t as comfortable as this. I immediately scheduled my follow up appointment.

There was also literally no wait time and everything was super clean!

10/10 would recommend.
If you’re been wanting to get waxed but afraid or insure, don’t be! I was and now I’m sad I waited this long.

name: Rebecca Querin
text:
I am very picky when it comes to my skin and the type of wax I use. I have been waxing for a very long time now and stopped shaving 2 years ago. My first time at Cabana Wax was for a bikini (never done it before). I was very anxious because of showing my parts. But let me tell you, if you're scared like me or insecure, honey you have no reason to fear. Bri did my wax and she was amazing. She made me feel super comfortable and had a conversation with me throughout the experience. I also had my period  that day (it came super early) and so they provided me with a tampon.
Since then I always go there to get my underarms, and happy trail done.
When I am ready to do a Brazilian I will surely go to them!

name: Hannah Bevis
text: I have left Cabana beyond satisfied with every visit!! Kristen is just the best :)

text: Kristen was great .She made me feel comfortable and explained everything step by step.Really appreciate it thanks!!

name: Amelia Hooper
text:
The studio itself is very clean and minimalist, the staff are friendly and professional, and I'm always in & out in less than 30 minutes. Services are punctual and scheduling is flexible.

I'm a repeat client of over a year, and I can't speak highly enough of the management. I've only ever had one negative experience, and Allison took it very seriously. She contacted me less than an hour after I left a private review, and she completely resolved the problem. If you bring any issue to their attention, they are happy to help fix it!

name: Mel Ponce
text: They are always so nice and definitely know what they are doing! I'm always 100% happy with my eyebrows whenever I go

name: Natalie Altman
text:
I tried this place because of all the great reviews I saw, however, I was disappointed. I gave it three stars because the place is clean and the people were friendly. Those were the only good things, though. The actual services I received (Brazilian and armpit wax) were done poorly. I still had patches(I could understand a couple strays, but not patches) of hair and I realized there was even wax still stuck to me when I got home. I was in and out in less than half an hour, which would have been great had the person actually done a good job. Seems that they were more interested in just getting it over with than doing quality work. They are the cheapest place around that I have seen and clearly, there’s a reason for that.

Edit: The owner of the business quickly messaged me with an apology and a refund. She was very kind and professional. Again, the facility was very clean and everyone was kind. Hopefully my experience was just a fluke.

name: Natasha Bodiford
text: Maddie was great. Overall experience was amazing.

name: Angela Barton
text: I am from Tampa, FL and went to a premier wax bar called Flirt. No shade to my girl back in Florida, but Kristin here at Cabana Wax is AHH-MAZING. She did my Brazilian and I feel bad for any hair that thought it stood a chance. This girl left me clean, from top to bottom. She wasn’t afraid to get in there and get any stragglers. They also use a mix of hard and soft wax which is 100% the way to go. (For those that don’t know hard wax can be used multiple times in the same area or used as a precursor for soft wax because it doesn’t adhere to skin) ANYWAYS. This girl is amazing, and the atmosphere was clean, spa-friendly, and quick. 10/10 would recommend to anyone. THANK YOU KRISTIN and see you in February :)

name: Jasmine Seiger
text: Very clean & professional. They did a wonderful job and the owner is incredibly sweet. 10/10 would recommend to anyone looking for a good waxing experience.

name: Tabitha Townsend
text: I went in for my very first Brazilian wax and Bri was awesome! She was very professional, fast and gentle. It was not as bad as I was expecting it to be. I will be back!

text: Kristen is a professional in every sense of the word! I hate that I waited so long to become a customer.

text: Cabana is a great place to come and get any service that you need. I was new to waxing and they made me feel super comfortable. I definitely recommended all of my friends. Candace was the amazing. Super nice.

text: This was my first Brazilian waxing experience. I booked an appointment online which was very user friendly and easy to follow. When I got there the greeter was very friendly and made me feel welcome and comfortable. Candice was who did my waxing appointment and I could not have been more pleased. She walked me through the whole process and we talked during the whole appointment. There was not a moment that I was uncomfortable or anxious about the waxing. She was bubbly and fun and really made the waxing experience wonderful. We all know that waxing is not pleasant, but she made it as enjoyable as possible to where I was able to finish the appointment with no problem. I highly recommend this spa and also Candice for your appointment. I cannot speak for the other employees, but if they are anywhere near as great as Candice, you are in spectacular hands. I will definitely be using their services again. (They also take Covid-19 precautions seriously which adds an extra level of safety and comfort to your appointment.)

text: I want to LOVE this place so bad. As for as the process, it's hands down the best experience I have gotten here in Huntsville. Staff is friendly, attentive, and professional. The studio is clean, welcoming, and in a good location. The service is pretty fast. Im usually out in 20 mins or less and it's less painful then other places I have been to. My only concern is that for me, the hair tends to grow back wayyy faster when I go here compared to other places I've gotten serviced at. There were noticeable hair stubs all over less than a week after my wax as if I had only shaved a few days before, so I kind of felt like I wasted $50 when I could have just shaved at home which is what I'll more than likely have to do in a week anyway because it's growing so fast. The same thing occurred after my first visit as well, but because the customer service is great and the place is clean and well put together, I returned anyway. I don't know if they use a different type of wax from other places or what. When I've visited other places (before and after going to cabana for the first time), I didn't notice hair stubs until at least 2.5-3 weeks after the wax. I'd still recommend the place to others. I'll probably try the other location out next time and see if I get the same results.

name: Business Trans
text:
Update: Someone from the establishment responded to my initial comment, obviously, very offended by MY OWN experience which no one is in control of nor will tell me to delete MY experience. Take constructive criticism so that you can improve not to take it personally because your comment definitely doesn’t encourage me to revisit & I’m sure turns potential clients away.

Also, it doesn’t matter if I have a chin wax or Brazilian wax, I’m paying YOU for a service that I felt was not up to par nor provided me comfort. MY experience in comparison to my regular waxing lady, who’s a licensed esthetician for 20yrs, to your staff of 5yrs, is a joke. You’re unsanitary, rude & I stand behind MY experience.

resp.text: Ma’am, your review was reported to Google because you defamed our business by irresponsibly claiming (without any basis) that our staff is not licensed. That is tantamount to an accusation that we are violating the law. I humbly believe anyone who reads your multiple bad reviews of Cabana Wax will be able to see, based on our over 100 5-star reviews, who the problem was here.

resp.text: Erin, I am so sorry this happened. I am the business owner, and I’m not sure how that happened, but I assure you We would never block someone trying to get information about our business (and patronize our business, which we use to support our family). Please call our studio at (256) 970-4300, and we will make it right and see to it that you get the excellent customer service you deserve. Thank you for your interest in Cabana!

name: null bul
text: The atmosphere was nothing like i expected, it has like a cold loft feel as opposed to a spa feel. The staff was nice but the non usage of gloves turned me off it’s just something im not used to. Also laying used wax strips near my face as opposed to the trash isnt exactly pleasant either but whatevs

resp.text: Hi, thank you for visiting our studio! We are not a spa; we’re a wax studio, and we do not advertise a spa environment :) most clients love our simple, no frills atmosphere and speedy service. It sounds like you had a facial waxing service. To be clear, our staff constantly sanitizes their hands between services (for their own protection and for that of our clients), and we have a 100 health rating from the Alabama Board of Cosmetology, which is on display in our reception area. Our technicians do not always use gloves during eyebrow wax services, because sometimes wax can get on the fingertip parts of a glove and get smudged onto parts of the brow line that are not meant to be waxed. In other words, in areas such as eyebrows where extra precision is needed to avoid removing too much hair, gloves can make the process more difficult. Gloves are always used during body waxing services. Thanks again for coming to try us out; it sounds like a traditional spa may be more your style!

name: Connie Johnson
text: Quaint location with easy appointments. Friendly and professional service.

name: Katherine Hau
text: To be honest, I was so excited for cabana to open, affordable Brazilians, convenient, and chic. I usually travel to atlanta for my Brazilians because I have been so satisfied with my visits to those waxing places. Because of my experience at cabana, I will continue to travel to Atlanta for my services. The rooms seemed unfinished with exposed ceilings and everything is stock white, which makes the time of service kind of nerve racking. The rooms are small and the beds are so rickety. I did not feel secure at all.. the structure of the studio was not designed well so when my aesthetician entered the room, my parts were facing the door... imagine someone walking by right when she opened the door... secondly, I get Brazilians about every two month.. I have never had a service where they used strips... do you know why strips aren’t used in a Brazilian? Because our skin is so sensitive, the strips are too abrasive for it. A few hours after my visit, my area broke out  in rashes and i got so irritated I had to see a doctor after because OTC cream did not help. I was rooting for cabana but because of this visit I will continue my well-worth-it commute to Atlanta.

name: Jill Roy
text: 10 out of 10 would recommend. Prompt friendly service. Super clean environment!

name: Destini Smith
text: My waxing experience was very comfortable and I was pleased with my results.

name: Jasmine Marie
text: the first time i went there my experience was good hard wax was used which i prefer due to extremely coarse hair.  my second experience wasn't the best however the owner went out her way to call me and make things right. Will be going back

name: Nicole Nix
text: Love going here!! Very professional, friendly staff.   Everyone makes you feel very comfortable and at ease.

name: Tara Guilfoil
text: This was my first Brazilian wax so I was nervous but Amber was so amazing and made the experience great. I will definitely be back!

name: Business Trans
text:
My first time coming here and I chose Bri for both me and my mom, firstly, she’s only been waxing for 5yrs, there were no gloves being used, didn’t even see her wash her hands, no wipes to wipe my face prior to waxing, i laid down on the table and she immediately began waxing, no skin analysis, no questions or conversation.

The door was open, no privacy, just a cart with hot wax, used wax globs, laying right next to the unused sticks to apply the wax

I only came here because my regular wax lady was out of town but i wont be coming back, this place is unsanitary but the receptionist was nice.

I wouldn’t recommend this place at all, I don’t believe any of these women are estheticians but whatevs.

Update: Someone from the establishment responded to my comment, obviously, very offended by MY OWN experience which no one is in control of nor will tell me to delete MY experience. You ladies need to take classes on professionalism because my comment wasn’t rude, simply MY experience. Take constructive criticism so that you can improve not to take it personally because your comment definitely doesn’t encourage me to revisit & I’m sure turns others away.

Also, it doesn’t matter what service I have, MY experience in comparison to my regular wax lady, who’s a licensed esthetician for 20yrs, to your staff of 5yrs, is a joke. You’re unsanitary & I stand behind MY experience.

resp.text: Thank you for trying out our studio. I want to address a few of your comments. First, she’s only been waxing for 5 years? That’s quite a while (and Bri is very experienced), so I’m not sure what you were expecting as far as years of experience. Second, there is no need for a formal “skin analysis” in the room; that’s why we have you fill out a form in reception where we ask, among other things, whether you have used retinol, Accutane, alpha hydroxy acids, etc. in the area(s) to be waxed and whether you’ve ever had a bad reaction to waxing. Even without a formal skin analysis as you call it, our technicians are analyzing your skin during the service and would immediately stop the service if there were any issues. Third, everyone who waxes at Cabana Wax has a current cosmetology or esthetics license, which is what the Alabama State Board of Cosmetology requires. The Board actually visited us a few weeks ago for our 2019 unannounced inspection (we got a 100), and licensure and cleanliness are the two main things they inspect. Your irresponsible comment about licensure insinuates that we are violating the law, which is slanderous, and I encourage you to remove it immediately. Finally, you had a chin wax; the technicians would never leave the treatment room door ajar for a Brazilian wax or any other intimate service. Thanks again for your business.

name: Kacy Hairell
text: A girlfriend and I went to Cabana Wax for a girls afternoon and they were so accommodating and sweet. Neither of us had been there before or had any services such as microdermabrasion or dermaplaning and they explained everything and were so patient and understanding!

text: I've been here a few times for several services. They are amazing and made me feel comfortable. Great at Brazilian waxes!

text: I had a great experience when I came to cabana wax. They were very nice and made sure I was well accommodated . Thank you guys !

name: Chandra W.
text: I will definitely be back here, they were quick, friendly, and the rooms were clean. I also liked how they used different waxes depending on the "area" since hair and skin thickness changes.

name: Jaeda Rochelle
text: Got my first Brazilian wax ever here and it was very quick and I didn’t feel the slightest bit uncomfortable like I expected to. Highly recommend

name: Jessica Hamilton
text: The girls at the front desk lack customer service skills, the person who done my wax was alright. However this has been the worst Brazilian that I’ve ever had in my life. I have never dealt with so many ingrown hairs and I am completely miserable from it. The most I’ve ever had from being waxed has been TWO total over the past 7 months, with this most recent wax I’ve literally (not even near joking) have had over 17. One of which I had to be placed on medication because it became abcessed.

resp.text: Jessica, we just called you to try to discuss the experience you have described in this review but were unable to reach you. I’m very sorry you have had ingrown hairs since your wax. We see you had an appointment in March but have not heard from you since then. We would have offered assistance with the ingrowns if we had known you were having a problem, but this is the first time we’re ever hearing about your experience, almost two months after the fact. We would sincerely love to help, but we cannot if we don’t know there’s a problem. Please call if there’s anything we can do to help you! We would love to do so. Thanks :)

I got two compliments on my skin that day, and I literally never get compliments for my skin! Danielle did an amazing job on my brazalian. It was my first time ever getting one and I dont think I can ever go back to shaving. She explained all the different waxes and why she was doing what and kept convo so it wasn't awkward whatsoever. I couldn't recommend either of these ladies more! The lady up front is always so welcoming with a smile on her face and is friendly! I will be a regular customer for sure!

Since then, I've been back for several other services, ranging from a brazilian, eyebrow wax, express facial, and skin consultation. They also have new hydrogelly masks that are AMAZING! Check them out... you won't be disappointed :)

name: Anne Wood
text: I was so excited when Cabana Wax opened up!! I live in 5 Points and the only places I knew of to get a Brazilian wax were pretty far away from me and all of them took over an hour, were crazy expensive, and to be honest just not worth it. Cabana is the perfect mix of quick, easy, affordable,  luxurious and comfortable. I know “luxurious” is not a word most would use to describe a Brazilian experience, let’s be real, that shiz is always gonna be unpleasant...but Amber and all the aestheticians have a totally laid back way of making you feel comfortable. I have also gotten dermaplaned there, had my eyebrows waxed, gotten a facial, etc and never been displeased with anything. Sure if you are expecting a lounge with spa water and a sauna and a 30 minute massage along with your services cabana might not be for you BUT if you are looking for a perfectly comfortable experience, that is quick and easy, with high-end products and services at a very reasonable price... Cabana is your shop! I’ll never go anywhere else 💚

text: I had a deep tissue massage with Joseph and he was great! I felt very comfortable, relaxed, and he worked out my areas of concern. Thank you, Joseph! I'll definitely be back!

name: Chelsei Martin
text:
I can’t say enough positive things about Nikki and Peaceful Kneads. This was my first massage experience, and was only a last resort turn for spinal therapy prior to surgical intervention. I had the 1hr cupping massage and after a single visit my dexterity in my hands improved, my pain and pressure in my neck and spine went from a solid 7 to a zero, and my overall attitude improved.

Her professionalism, ability to make you feel comfortable, and address your unique needs is out of this world. Massages can some time hold an intimidating cost, for the price and quality of this experience you can feel confident knowing you are getting more than you pay for! Thank you guys!

name: Elizabeth
text: Very bad experience. Beforehand I took the time to read the requirements for COVID, and they said you needed to wait in your car to be called in, someone would meet you at your car to take your temp and that you needed to wear a mask while entering the facility. Well none of that happened except I wore my mask in the facility. After I entered the room and started to prepare for my massage I was told I would need to wear a mask while I was on my back! I was shocked at this info, because it was not stated anywhere that I took the time to read beforehand! So I simply told the lady I will just remain on my stomach for the whole massage. There is no way I would of taken the time off, paid a sitter and drove the 2 hours round trip for a massage if I had known I had to wear a mask! Well it just got worse! As I laid down on the table and put my face in the face holder, I felt like I could't breath and was being smothered in the sheet it was wrapped in...well I was! There was a small "bag" made out of the sheet wrapped around the head rest that you had to breath into! At this point I was very upset. I got dressed quickly and left. I had just waisted 3 hours, which includes driving 2 hours and paid a sitter for this!.....gets better. I was so upset that I forgot my initial diamond and white gold chain! I called immediately, and OF course....Nope, it was so where to be found! The lady said she looked everywhere, and I appreciate that. But what was supposed to be a relaxing afternoon turned out costing me over $1000. Very upset.

name: Deidra Clarke
text: Y’all I went in limping, came out skipping! I will most definitely be back! If you are second guessing please don’t, these are professionals who knows where to hit, what to hit, and how to hit it! Book Anne Folkes!!!! No lie! It is so worth it. It was even my one year anniversary and they had flowers and cider set up for us!!! 5 stars from cleanliness to professionalism to quality!!!!!

text: Nikki is fabulous. I’m a dancer, so my legs always need attention, and when I leave after an appointment I feel soooo much better! I recommend her to everyone I know that needs a massage therapist. The interior design is very atmospheric, and the location is pretty easy to get to if you’ve been around Montgomery before. I’d rate 6/5 stars if it was possible.

text: Amazing staff, very clean, and professional.

resp.text: Thank you Jenn, we love what we do and we do our best every day. :)

name: Stephen Siler
text: I have seen multiple therapists in Montgomery over the years, but Nikki Roberts at Peaceful Kneads gives the best deep tissue sports massage I've ever had.  I also like that she'll work with you on appointment times and has online scheduling.  Her studio is super convenient just off of Vaughn & Taylor and exactly reflects its name: Peaceful.  You're simply not going to find a better studio or therapist in Montgomery.  This is the easiest 5 star review ever.

resp.text: Thank you, Steve! I'm glad you're enjoying the new space and thank you for allowing me to be your therapist for the past 9+ years!

name: Trinity Dicks
text: Amazing! Everyone is so kind! Great prices and wonderful services! You won’t go wrong!

resp.text: Thanks Trinity, we look forward to seeing you again!

name: Kristen Brown
text: I went in for a pre-natal massage with Nikki and it was absolutely AMAZING. Not just the massage, but the entire experience. From the moment I walked in the door, I was set at ease and that didn't change the entire time I was there. Nikki was very thorough and discussed everything I needed, along with what she would do before hand. I am very pregnant right now and she made sure my comfort level was perfect, checking with me occasionally. The massage room was wonderful. So calming, so soothing, and so peaceful. The sheets and pillows are probably some of the softest I have ever touched! Just a wonderfully peaceful environment altogether. I will definitely return!!

name: Ken Furman
text: As an almost 62 year old retiree (but very active one at that), the highlight (by far) of my wonderfully blissful life is my monthly appointment with Nikki!  I have moved 18 times in my life and traveled extensively in corporate America for 35 years; and I was blessed to be able to prioritize a monthly massage wherever I might live at the time. Needless to say, I have been cared for by a plethora of massage therapists but NEVER have I been as richly blessed by the quality of massage I receive monthly at Peaceful Kneads!!!  As noted above ... that 1 1/2 hours is consistently the best time segment of my month ... (and the twice annual gift to self of a 3 hour massage is the ultimate experience).   In summation:  Blessed...Blessed...Blessed by Nikki and Peaceful Kneads.

resp.text: Ken, you are such a Blessing to those around you..I feel so grateful to be able to work on you each month and to hear all the great things you do for the community. Thank you for the humbling review.

name: Mary Evelyn Baxter
text: I love Nikki and am extremely grateful for her talent. I am constantly on the go and running around. Cycling, running, swimming, lifting weights, scuba diving, and anything else I can get into. I put my body through the ringer and Nikki always makes it better. It doesn't matter how many knots I have Nikki works them out and I walk out feeling better than I did walking in.

resp.text: Super Woman needs therapy too! Thank you and I hope I can keep you moving through every new adventure you take.

name: betz sinep
text: I moved to AL two years ago from WA and had been looking for massage therapist who actually knew what they were doing. I've had multiple neck and back injuries. Last week I found my person. My boyfriend had bought me a gift certificate for Peaceful Kneads and I promptly made an appointment with Tabi. That girl has some magical healing hands!! She knows how to release muscles without causing pain or leaving bruises. She's one of those professionals who continues her education not because she has to, but to learn as much as she can to further help her patients. I will definitely be going back!!

resp.text: We are so lucky to have Tabitha at Peaceful Kneads now! She is the most passionate therapist I've met In a long time and she truly cares about her client's health. Thank you for your kind review and we look forward to seeing you soon! -Nikki

name: Marihaj Mitchell
text: Great atmosphere,very professional, and great service!!!! I had recently developed upper back pain due to improper sleeping and this pain went on for a few days. I finally decided to browse the internet and find a place to get a massage. I found many different places but I found that Peaceful Kneads Massage was the easiest to book online. OMG!!! Booking with Lisa was the best decision I made, she know exactly what she's doing. My back was hurting to the point where it hurt when I breathe. After she was done with my massage I instantly felt better then I did before I came. But the next morning, that next morning, I was back!!!! I don't have any back pain!!! So to Lisa at Peaceful Kneads Massage, Thankyou! Thank you! Thank you! ❤️

resp.text: Thank you Marihaj, as you've noted the benefits of massage are usually most notable on the following day or days afterward!

name: Isaac
text: Good massage, but not up to par for what it takes to really give a deep tissue massage for a person that weight lifts often.

resp.text: Issac, I'm sorry to hear the pressure wasn't sufficient for your needs! We strive to carefully listen to our clients during the scheduling process in order to match them with the therapist best suited to help them achieve their goals for their session and during the intake process to make sure we go over expectations right before the session begins. The therapist we scheduled you with is used to working with athletes and has sports massage and myofascial release technique training which both use Deep Tissue work, but sometimes this doesn't necessarily translate into what a client would call or expect as Deep Pressure. I would love to talk with you and set you up with myself or a different therapist to make things right and to see if we can meet your expectations. I'll contact you this week to see if we can do this. Thank you for your feedback! Peace, Nikki Roberts.

I had to switch nail technicians to Cindy and she did my nails very well for two years. I don't go there anymore because she did my SNS and a week later it was lifting up and she wanted to fix it when it was convenient for her and not when it was convenient for me...the customer.

name: Veronica Corral
text:
I had SNS with Selena, she was rude, inattentive, messy, and rushed. My nails were unevenly filed and she flooded my nail with top coat without cleaning it up after. The entire staff seemed lost and overwhelmed with the amount of clientele in the shop. The entire place is small, cluttered and messy. Save your self the trip and look for the better rated nail salons out there. The only reason I came here was because the Royal Day Spa was booked. Never again.

Check out the Royal Day Spa; considerate, good, attentive and professional!

name: Shauna S
text: Very professional, clean. friendly,  & good full service spa.

name: Natasha Washington
text: Annie The best SNS work in Mobile polite professional and patient and Ann very detaile Quality Long lasting Great job every time. Worth my time and money.

name: Mandy Jenkins
text: I have had a massage, facial, and most recently my nails done and all have been great  experiences!!

name: Ashley Brasher
text: Walk-ins welcome, hardly any wait time for an eyebrow wax. The worker asked what I wanted and was able to give me exactly what I wanted with my eyebrow wax

name: Danielle M
text: Very inconsiderate. I Didn't cancel my appt in time, and they wouldn't reschedule or even give me a gift certificate without the full payment again after already being charged $140. They will never have my business again or a referral😠

name: Dionne Harris-Henderson
text: I love this spot!! So laid back and the staff is friendly 🤗

name: Dalila Piñón
text:
They don't know what they're doing here. It's a very drab place and all the employees were rude.

I got SNS done here because my usual place was booked. Even though Nina was a sweetheart and very deligent,  it still wasn't enough to look past my uneven nails. Their methods are dated, which I'm sure has to do with the dated staff.

If you're looking for a real spa/ salon experience this isn't the place to go. Listen to the bad reviews on here, even the ones from years ago; they seem to match my experience pretty well.

text: This will be my 1st time going to Island day spa my sister n law got me a gift certificate from here for my graduation and I hope ill enjoy it.

Acrylic must be old because it’s only going on week two and my entire nail is lifting . I have not happened unless they were on for too long of a time and I do wear gloves to
Clean and wash dishes and this is happening to every nail I am highly disappointed

name: Stephanie Smith
text: I was more than impressed with Jinny and all her knowledge of hair. She was professional, friendly, and patient. She listened to what I wanted, studied the pictures I gave her of ideas I had, gave me her professional opinion about the style and color that would be best suited for me, and helped me to achieve the perfect cut and color! I will be back. Not disappointed in the slightest!!! I found her on groupon for an amazing deal! Thank you Jinny for your amazing service! You ROCK!

name: Jane AWAM
text: Met Jenny for the first time yesterday for highlights and a haircut.  She was on time, very polite and professional. Took a picture of the style I wanted and she nailed it!! I have found my stylist. Great job!!

name: Vickie Soto
text:
Jinny was very sweet, conversational, and professional.
I really love my hair.
I loved hearing about her sweet family.  Felt very comfortable there.

name: Farheen Surtie
text: Unfortunately, I had a bad experience. I bought a Groupon for Shear Perfection. I tried SEVERAL times to schedule an appointment. I left text messages, I called and left several voice mails to callback and I never got a response. I even went by to see if I could  schedule an appointment, and her hours stated that she was open but she was closed. My Groupon expired and I lost money! Unprofessional.

resp.text: Sorry that happened. I will still take your Groupon even it’s expired. Please text me your number and I will call you right away.

name: Helisher Reynolds
text: My first time getting Brazilian wax and she made me feel very comfortable and was done in about 10 minutes. I will be back

name: Quite Marvelous
text: I absolutely love Shear Perfection! Jenny provides excellent customer service, amazing results and is a fantastic communicator.

name: Samantha Schmitt
text: Jinny does a very quick and efficient job for waxes completely recommend her!

name: Julie Zerk
text: Jenni was very sweet and professional! She did a great bikini wax and I was in and out in about 10 mins!

name: Amanda Dunham
text: The lady was very nice but this is the worst haircut I have ever had in my entire life! I specifically told her that I didn't want thick bangs. I even showed her where the last place (Wal-Mart) cut way too many bangs. I also showed her an old picture of myself with my thin bangs, just the way I like them. She ended up cutting the whole front of my head in bangs! Not only that but rather than the long bangs like I showed her she cut them so short I can't do anything with them! It is a real shame when Wal-Mart salon cuts hair better than a private salon. I am so embarrassed I don't even want to go out in public! I would NOT recommend this salon!!!

name: tony chaney
text: Very professional and friendly. Pleased with my results!!!

name: Heather Bankester
text:
After waiting 45 mins past my scheduled appt time (not counting the 10 mins I arrived early)...my hair is a disaster. I asked for blonde highlights and received two concentrated highlights around my face and barely any in my hair. The cut is also horrible. I asked for layers on top and now one side is shorter than the other side.
I'm having to pay someone else to fix it.
I was told I could come back for more highlights but there would be a charge...despite not doing it right the first time. Also, Groupon had a sale for about $10 less but she still tried to have me pay the original Groupon price (before sale was added). What a waste of time and money.

name: Kayla Trotter
text: Love jinny

We had great conversation the entire time and she turned my Grey frizzy mess into beautiful brown curls. I had such an amazing experience! Thank you Tanya, so very much! I cant wait to come back!

She did exactly what we asked her to do and we left completely pleased!  She's a great stylist - she listened - took her time to understand what we wanted.  We'll be going back to see her in four weeks to keep our cuts looking fresh!  Great job, Alexis!!  Thank you!

resp.text: Thank you so much. Glad you both were pleased and we will see you again in 4 weeks
