text: Top notch massage!!! This salon knows how to do the job!!! Thumbs up for a job well done Terra( sorry if I spelled it wrong). Overall this will be my spot for a relaxing professional massage.. Way to go ladies!!!

name: Amanda Sweeney
text: The staff is very friendly and it is a very clean place. However, I came in to get my eyebrows done and left VERY disappointed in the results. I had to keep myself from crying after I left. I was asked to begin with if I wanted them to be thinned or if I just wanted them cleaned up and I told her that I did not want them thin. Well, they are now extremely thin and they look terrible. I didn’t complain in person, because there was really nothing that could be done. I will definitely not be back though.

name: Abbie Lane
text: I'm  regular with Manon. She's so fast, and does a great job! I've never had a bad experience! I would not go anywhere else. Customer service is GREAT!!!!

name: Emily Daleo
text: I received a certificate for a massage for Christmas and decided to go ahead and schedule the massage. They made the appointment for 3:00 on a Friday. On Wednesday, they called to tell me that they had double booked my appointment, and ask me to come in at a different time on Friday. I was not able to come in at that time, so I had them schedule an appointment for the next Friday at 3:00. When I walked into the spa, I was told that I was not on the schedule. They don't send confirmations of your appointment, and they don't call to remind you of your appointment. Apparently, they really just have trouble booking your appointment at all. Not exactly the kind of experience I want from a spa, and I won't be trying to reschedule again.

resp.text: This was an unfortunate event that we took very seriously. We issued a complete refund of the gift certificate and offered a free 90 minute massage. All clients who are on our schedule receive either a text message or phone call the day before their appointment. We take pride in giving the very best customer service.

name: Valentina Muzaric
text: Colleen is absolutely great. She is putting a lot of thoughts in how to get desired outcome without damaging your hair. She is the one to go to. Everybody is really nice and outgoing.

name: Brandi Wilson
text: Everyone was very nice. I got a Brazilian wax and she made me feel very comfortable, with such a uncomfortable waxing. 😊

name: Alex Woods
text: love all the staff ! Everyone here is very nice , helpful , and professional . 10/10 would recommend !!!

name: Teresa Butler
text: I went to see Matt because of my neck and shoulder pain. He was able to me to be able to move my neck. I always go see him when my hip acts up. Matt is very professional and listens to your concerns. Thanks Matt for great service!

name: Elizabeth Bailey Matson
text: I went to have a trial of my hair and make up and it took 2 hrs for my hair alone and I was not happy with the outcome. I had scheduled to have my hair and make up done, but they had to rush the make up and would have cancelled the trial if I hadn't persisted that I wanted to see the whole picture before my wedding. They hadn't booked enough time from the beginning. I wanted natural looking makeup, but it is caked on and not flattering. I went here after I saw all the positive reviews, but I did not have a positive experience! I'm so glad I tried before my wedding day as the whole thing stressed me out and it's not even the big day!

resp.text: At Ambiance it's our goal to make every Bride feel and look beautiful on her wedding day! During the consultation we strive to find the best hair and make up style with the client for her Big Day. The trial run is very important to us and sometimes it takes longer than anticipated because we want the client to be happy. Therefore, we offer a second complementary trial run! We regret you were not satisfied and we hope you will come back for your complementary trial run to perfect your look.

name: Marina Schroeder
text: I went in for a wax, the facility gives an outward appearance of being very clean and calming, and the employees are all very pleasant, however they double dip the wax! By this I mean they put the same stick that they've put on your body back into the wax (which is not hot enough to kill bacteria that resides on your skin), and unless they change the wax every time a new customer comes in (unlikely, and very expensive), you're getting everyone else's microorganisms on your body, yuck! Not only is this extremely unhygienic and disgusting, it's also illegal. Will not be returning here.

resp.text: Here at Ambiance Spalon we are committed to offering you the cleanest experience in town. We sanitize every room and every utensil after every service. Double dipping is a No No! When you come to Ambiance we guarantee a safe environment for all our customers.

name: Crazy Christy
text: Very nice service very nice salon keep up the good work

name: Jasmine Williams
text: My first time ever getting a Brazilian wax this is where I decide to go; however I waited until I’d gone a few more times before writing this review. They use a special “wax” called Nufree-Finipil which you can research on your own. The facility is very relaxing & clean. Ms. Manon is EXCELLENT! She’s very friendly & will talk to you throughout the wax to keep you distracted. No bumps, no burns from the wax, & no regrowth for at least 2 weeks! Could not have asked for a better experience!!

name: david baker
text: Ive been getting my hair cut by Matthew since I was about 6 years old. Im 24 now and he's the only person I let cut my hair. My cut is called "the usual?". Hand shakes coming and going and always a smile with a good story to follow. All in all, its a quick, enjoyable and quite relaxing experience everytime I go.

name: Kassie Mink
text: Manon is absolutely wonderful!! She made waxing a relaxing and pain free experience.

name: Jade Dawson
text: Manon is the best! I was so nervous and afraid waxing was going to hurt. She put me at ease and it did not hurt at all. I highly recommend her to everyone!

name: Melissa and Steve Blackmon
text: Always the best experience with the best customer service!

name: Claude Fortin
text: Awesome organization, very well managed, very nice facility and great people, hairdressers and massage therapists.

name: Savannah Turner
text: This place is amazing! The atmosphere is always so relaxing and professional!

name: T Vines
text: The wax is painful but VERY WORTH IT! The staff is Awesome!

name: Lauren Coker
text: Ambiance is the best place to go for a one stop shop! You can get a massage, facials, waxing, a new hairstyle and a mani/pedi all in one place! I had never had a wax before in my life, and Manon was so great! I've also had my hair done by a couple of the girls in the salon and everyone is awesome! i can't wait to try out everything else Ambiance has to offer!

name: Jeff McKelvey (JMedia)
text: My daughter really likes this place. The people there are really nice and they did a great job on her make up for the prom last year.

name: Marnie Juster
text: I went to Ambiance Spalon for the first time this afternoon and had an excellent experience. I had an appointment with Manon, who was incredibly sweet and helpful! I would definitely recommend them and plan on returning!

name: Sharon Sparks
text: I made an appointment on Valentines Day, Feb 14, 2013. I had never been to Ambiance Spalon before. However, Laura Beth that is a hair & color stylist had done my hair for 8 years when I lived in Rome, Ga from 2003-2011. I was moving to Charleston, Sc and she was moving to Auburn, Al. Although I was excited to be moving to Charleston I wasn't excited about having to find a new hair stylist. Every time she would do my hair when I would get home my husband would always say your hair looks nice. When she was No longer doing my hair it looked nice but I never got the compliments that I use to get when Laura Beth was doing my hair. Every time I would go get my hair done I would think I sure wish Laura Beth was still doing my hair i missed her. My husband started looking for a new job and we found out we were moving to Newnan,Ga. I started thinking, I wonder how far she is from where I was moving to. I got on Mapquest and it was 76 miles. I didn't care, it was worth every mile I drove for her to be doing my hair again. Ambiance is a very nice place and everyone there is very friendly. I met the owners that day and they are really nice. You won't regret going to Ambiance and getting Laura Beth to do your hair. Best decision I ever made to drive 76 miles to get my hair done. Worth every mile.

name: Lisa Ballew
text: Chassity Bullard is the best hair dresser in town. I have been using her for YEARS. She's worth the 2.5 hour drive from north Alabama!! Thanks girl!! <3

name: nadia Brundage
text: Ambiance Salon is the absolute best place to go for hair, nails, and awesome body massages.

name: Melanie Mitchell
text: Very professional and clean. Monan did a great job on my waxing services!

name: Patricia Knight, LME
text: Ambiance Spalon is definitely a place to be pampered! The staff is very friendly and professional. I will definitely be going back!!!!! Thank you, Ambiance!!!

name: Bill Kazmaier
text: I got my wife a Spa Package for Valentine's day! She absolutly loved it! She enjoyed a relaxing massage and facial and loved her pedicure and manicure! Before she left the girls did her hair and make up so she felt and looked amazing on our Valentine's date! Thanks Ambiance spalon!

name: Tamara Thompson
text: The staff at Ambiance is Fabulous!!   It is very easy to schedule an appointment, the spa is relaxing and the staff is knowledgeable about the products and services offered.

name: Anne Penney
text: I love Manon!  She gives the best shellac manis and spa pedis.  So very accomodating and they always look perfect!  The first time I went I knew I had found a great "home".

name: Farren Harrelson
text: I received a gift certificate for Christmas and went for a massage and mani/pedi recently.  This was a devine experience.  The staff is so professional and caring.  I absolutely loved it!!!  I will be going back frequently.

name: Jan Griffin
text: I have been coming to Chassity for 7 years and have always leave feeling like a rockstar. I have Puerto Rican hair and very thick hard to manage hair and she always takes the time to make me beautiful! I have been to multiple salons over the years and each time I felt like my hair looked worse coming out than going in until I met her! I will follow her where ever she goes and absolutely love Ambiance Spalon. It is a great place to visit and love the staff and atmosphere. I have and always will recommend Chassity for all your haircutting, coloring and waxing needs. Ambiance also offers other services such as massage, facials, pedicures, and manicures. Making it the perfect one stop shop salon.

name: Gracie Barnes
text: This is gracie.. im chats cousin and she's been doing my hair and eyebrows forever and I'd never go anywhere else honestly she does such an amazing job!

name: Christina Knight
text: I made an appt. today and everyone was very nice!  I will be back.  Thanks!!!

name: Angie LaBerge
text:
I'm researched hair salons for a month when I moved here and decided to try Ambiance! Wow,, Colleen is amazing!! I love the care, advice and the time she gives to me & more importantly, to my hair. And before you walk out the door you'll feel like you've been her friend for years. She's an amazing stylists and has an awesome personality!!  Unless she relocates,,,Im a client 4ever!!!
I also get brazillian wax & eyebrows! Super job! Everyone is very friendly & I feel comfortable & relaxed everytime I go in for my appts.

name: Shawn Reaves
text:
WORST SPA EXPERIENCE OR LACK THEREOF THAT I HAVE EVER HAD!!!

I made an appointment for a brazilian wax Friday morning because they had a great web special going for $39, upon which I specifically asked the owner did they do guys and was it ok. The owner said not a problem and let the receptionist make the appointment for Tuesday of the following week. On Monday I get a call around noon and informed they do not do guys and that she was "sorry"....Why did she make the appointment in the first place?

Now I tried to call around Auburn but no one has any appointments open for the the next day on such short notice. Now their policy is to deduct half the price of your service if you give them less than 24 hours notice, yet what do I get when they give me less than 24 hours notice....nothing!!! The point is I counted on them to provide a service that they said they would and now Im left having to travel out of town possible to get waxed.

A word of advice to Ambiance Spalon...if your going to advertise you might want to say no guys or girls only on your ad so in the future this doesnt happen!! And how about reimbursing me for the extra money I had to pay someone else for waxing because I relied on your business.

name: ELIZABETH TUCKER
text: KELLY WALLS IS AWESOME!!! GO SEE HER

name: Lawrence Williams
text: Great place to get your message

name: Robert Shannahan
text: Hannah is great!

name: Kathleen Gard Engle
text: Very nice staff

name: Antoinette Floyd
text: Very patient

name: William Moates
text: Loved it.

name: T Moraes
text: Serene atmosphere!

name: Julie Phillips
text: Wonderful service

name: Alyssa Hansen
text: While I would love to rate this 5 stars for the absolutely spectacular massages my wife and I received, we got slapped with some fees that weren’t explained to us or shown at the time of booking. What we thought would be $150 experience put us double that in the hole. The website states an intro massage is $60 and a hot stone $80, so we booked one of each and asked if we could be in the same room (as in a couples massage). Had the most relaxing, soothing experience from beginning to end. But unknown to us, there’s a separate charge for a couples massage. It was never stated during booking, during check in, or during check out. And unfortunately I was so relaxed as we paid, I didn’t think to ask the total, nor was the total given to me. Just took my card, swiped, and we left. Didn’t realize the extra charge was there til checking our statement today. Called and THEN for the 1st time we heard about the couples massage fee. And now it’s too late. It’s a shame because Tai gave the best massage I’ve ever had, but I won’t be back due to irresponsible charging.

resp.text: Hi, thank you for reaching out with your honest concerns. We are disappointed to hear about your recent experience. If you are willing, please call or email us directly at (256) 384-1178 or Mgr.huntsville@handandstone.com so we can discuss how we can begin to make this better. We value your business and we hope to hear from you soon.

name: Elena Sierakowski
text: I went here for my birthday and it was my first time visiting. I had Nick and he was amazing!! He started our session off by asking questions so he’d know how to best help fix me. I’ve had a lot of built up stress from work and kids and he did a wonderful job of getting out most of my knots and getting rid of my headache. It was a really great experience and I absolutely plan on coming back!

name: Marlena Kenney
text: Ty is the absolute best! She addressed my areas of concern and I felt 100% better. I will be returning for her professionalism & expertise. Thanks Ty! 😁

resp.text: Hi Marlena, thanks for highlighting our staff in your positive review! If there is ever anything else we can assist you with, please don't hesitate to reach out.

name: Jessica Brown
text:
I had my first prenatal massage with Tara and let me just say, WONDERFUL! I went in with some tension in my shoulders and upper back (pregnancy during a pandemic can be stressful 🤣) so I called prior to my appointment to ask if the prenatal massage could be customized and if I could have more of a focus in that  area rather than in my lower back that typically accompanies pregnancy. Of course, the ladies up front that answered my call were incredibly friendly and went out of their way to check with the therapist instead of just placating me with some generic answer. They were also very friendly and professional when I arrived.
Once it came time for my massage, Tara explained everything first and made me feel completely at ease and comfortable. I did add on the Lavender aromatherapy and wondered if it would be worth it or not due to wearing a mask. It. Was. Worth. It. Just do it. You won’t regret it. The massage itself was excellent and met all of my standards. There was a time or two that I almost felt like asking her to move on to a different area because the pressure was beginning to be too much for me (it was a good hurt, don’t worry, I’m just a wimp), but it was almost as if she was so in tuned with me that she moved on before I got to that point. At checkout, they were offering  a wellness package, and while I passed on it due to the fact that I’ll be having a baby soon and won’t have the availability for a while, it is definitely something I’ll consider in the future. If you want to ensure you’ll make time for a monthly massage or facial, get it! It’s time to treat yourself!

resp.text: Thanks for sharing your positive experience, Jessica! We are happy to hear you are feeling relaxed and rejuvenated after your appointment at Hand & Stone Huntsville! We look forward to your next visit.

name: Rosalee Martin
text:
Kim did my facial/waxing and it was amazing. She was open and let me know I could speak up of I didn't like something
It was like being with a long time friend. I was so incredibly relaxed after. I will be coming back. The front desk staff was so nice as well.

name: Premier Billing & Credentialing
text: This has been the worst experience with a membership.  Because my sister is a manager of a store and I have seen things done right I know that they should be doing better!  I have attempted to contact the manager here a few times but always told she is not in-go figure.  But I will be filing a complaint with the BBB.

name: Nick Firmin
text: Catherine was absolutely amazing! She was able to connect to my true essence. So much attention to detail to my body!!

resp.text: Hi Nick, we're pleased to hear you were satisfied with your experience at Hand & Stone Huntsville! Come back and see us again any time!

name: Shanika Ogburn
text: I went for the first time on my birthday. It was excellent! I knew it would be because I sent my husband last month. He's not easily impressed and he thoroughly enjoyed it. I signed up to be a member! Great staff, great massages and facials!

resp.text: Hi Shanika, thanks for letting us know you had such a great experience! We hope to see you again soon!

name: Bonnie Robertson
text: Monica was detail oriented, skilled and fun to talk with. Hydro-facial revived skin stressed by wearing a mask. Highly recommend asking for her by name!

name: Jeanna Lang
text:
Pros: Clean facility, you can book online to suit your schedule, decent price

Cons: While you can book online, they constantly call to ask you to change your appt to what suits them better. When I first went in, I was convinced to sign up, with a selling point that family members got the same rate as the member. I started booking for my Husband. They then told me it was only once every six months a guest could come in. So we signed him up. We have each had several massages there. Only one each has been great (Vielka and Shirley). The great massage therapists book far in advance which leaves you with subpar at best to choose from. It’s been disappointing.

name: Victoria Brown
text: I have had deep tissue massages all over the country and world because of my military career. This place is HANDS DOWN the BEST!!! It is hard to find a spa that has such highly trained and knowledgable staff which is led by the  lead therapist Terra! I have been going for 3 or 4 months now and the difference is AMAZING! DEFINITELY RECOMMEND!!! 6 STARS!!!

name: Madison Guy
text: They have nice and caring people that work there. They do their job well.

resp.text: Hi Madison, it is great to hear our wonderful staff was so considerate during your appointment! We hope to see you here again in the future!

name: Gina Barlow
text: I had a wonderful experience.  The staff was friendly and my therapist Shirley was really great.  I highly recommend the Himalayan salt hot stone treatment.

name: Kaitlin Bachmeyer
text: Wonderful Experience! Everyone in the building was sweet, kind and helpful. The Therapist I saw was a true Healer! On our first meeting she directly addressed issues with her hands which my past 5 medical doctors had not been able to figure out. The experience and intuition she brought into our session made me feel "seen" and cared for the first time in years. I was nervous to come in because of COVID19 but they have their sanitary policies down pat, and I felt very comfortable that they were being diligent with hygiene! Thank you Hand and Stone of Huntsville!

resp.text: Kaitlin, thank you for the kind words and wonderful review! It brings us great joy to see our members and guests happy. We look forward to seeing you again soon! Take care!

name: James Taylor
text: I’ve had massages here since it opened. Whitney has been my massage therapist the last 3 times , I highly recommend her to anyone who wants a deep tissue, hot stone , or just a relaxing massage. She does amazing work and has just a really chill and relaxing personality. Front desk staff are friendly and very helpful. Seriously great place to get a massage and have all your aches , pains , and stress melt away.

resp.text: We are happy to hear you've found the perfect massage therapist for you, James! Thank you for sharing and we look forward to your next visit!

name: Justin Cartledge
text: Facilities are clean and modern, staff is friendly, and they offer a wide variety of services at a reasonable cost.  However, scheduling can be tricky and walk-ins are rarely available.  The monthly membership is the worth it if you need a massage frequently.

name: Sonia Lazaro
text: Received a massage as a birthday gift and I was very happy with the one I got! Katie, the masseuse, was professional, kind, and accommodating, and provided a very relaxing experience. Everything was incredibly clean and the atmosphere was perfect. Will definitely be back for more!

name: Olivia Pannell
text: I came in for a facial and Ken did and Amazing job! She was very thorough and patient you can tell she cares about her work and her guests being comfortable. She checked on me continuously during the service especially during the extractions. The experience was seamless all the way from the phone call to make an appointment until I walked out!

name: Audrey Fitz-Gerald
text: Not only did I have a scheduling issue with my first visit but I had a problem with my second . I'm 16 weeks pregnant. I made this abundantly clear on my paperwork (which they claim I didn't fill out LIES) . I also made it clear on my first appointment. When I booked my second appointment I showed up and they cancelled on me bc "they didn't know I was pregnant " and she implied it was my fault for not telling them 🤦🏼‍♀️ MAM ! I filled out 500 questionnaires and have already gotten one prenatal !  Anyways , the manager is rude and poorly informed . I cancelled my membership and plan on writing several more reviews. If you're pregnant or just value your time STAY CLEAR !

resp.text: Audrey, falling short of meeting your expectations is not to the standards we strive to achieve, and we humbly ask for the opportunity to make this right. If you are willing, please contact us at (256) 384-1178 or Mgr.huntsville@handandstone.com. Thank you providing this information so we can improve upon our services.

name: Angelia H.
text: I love this place! They are really professional and make you feel so comfortable. Chris is amazing! My husband uses Tangela and he said she’s amazing as well! Definitely worth the membership

name: Nicole Story
text: After verbally twlling me they excepted Spafinder gift cards, the declined it when I went in for my treatment.  I was a few minutes late and it took 15 minutes to get my Visa gift card from the car. I was then told that I only had time for 30 minutes  of my hour massage.  I left in tears! I have never felt so embarrassed and lied to.

resp.text: Hi, thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We take our reviews seriously and would like the chance to look into your particular situation further. When you have a chance, please reach out to the spa at (256) 384-1178 or Mgr.huntsville@handandstone.com and we can try and turn your experience around. We hope to hear from you soon.

name: Shalayne Palmer
text: The service is AMAZING and I love the atmosphere.

name: Samantha Taylor
text: Very happy with my experience here! The entire staff was welcoming and accommodating as soon as I walked in the door. The waiting area was beautiful, tranquil and clean. I chose to get a 1 hour deep tissue massage which was incredible. The massage therapist was very attentive and she did a wonderful job listening to me and ensuring the pressure was just right. I would highly recommend this place to anyone and everyone looking for a truly relaxing experience. I will be back!

name: Ashley Kelly
text: Very nice and clean place.  Staff was extremely nice and accommodating.  My masseuse was good, but I will ask for someone different next time.  There was an area in the shoulders that she seemed to want to REALLY work out (however, I think it was part of my natural anatomy maybe because it never budged and it was present on both sides), and she pressed so hard for so long that it became uncomfortable and hurt, so I had to ask her to stop (let me clarify, I'm not a wimp, I can take pain). She moved on to the other areas in my back, legs, and feet which felt really good, but she had spent so much time on the shoulder area, that I felt those areas did not get as much attention as they needed. I will give it 4 stars because I did not encounter an unfriendly person the entire time I was there, and it was extremely clean and tranquil.  I will give the masseuse 3 stars.  I will go back.  I would like to give their other services a try as well.

name: Daniel Johnson
text: An absolutely wonderful experience!  Very professional staff who is amazing at their profession.   I will definitely get another appointment!

name: kelli jones
text: Always professional especially during covid everything is clean, staff is friendly they do temp. Checks and everyone wears a mask, and the message is very relaxing and they pay attention to your issues you need wrking on wear you carry more stress, I ve been going to Daniel for a yr hes the best massage therapist

name: Lindsey Goldensoph
text: I had Matthew for a massage today. Not only was he very kind but he also was very skilled and did an amazing job. The front desk associates were incredibly welcoming and sweet. I am very impressed and will only be going to Hand & Stone from now on! The introductory cost is incredibly low for the quality of an experience you get in return. I would recommend this establishment to everyone I know!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review! We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your service at Hand & Stone Huntsville! Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon!

name: Amanda Goeke
text:
Hand and stone is doing an excellent job in this time of Covid. I feel safe every time I go in, as they are only allowing individuals who have appointments, and our temperature was checked upon arrival.

I have had a couple of the therapists, and they have all been wonderful. I highly recommend

name: Patrick Bolton
text: Very great people there! They remember my name and the massages are great!

resp.text: Thank you for reaching out. We would like to apologize for the frustration you experienced while trying to reach us. If you are willing to give us another chance, please contact the spa at (256) 384-1178 or Mgr.huntsville@handandstone.com at your earliest convenience so we can answer any lingering questions you may still have. We look forward to hearing from you. Have a great day!

name: Britania
text: Everyone was so attentive to the clients needs.

name: Matthew Pickens
text: I've had three sessions with Hand and Stone so far, and each one has been exemplary. The greeting/checkout staff are marvelously helpful and always cheerful; they provide a welcoming, relaxing vibe from walking in to walking out. I've been having deep-tissue massages with Ronnie S., and I cannot recommend him highly enough. His technique is masterful, and he is always highly communicative about what he is doing, why he is doing it, and with frequent checks to make sure the pressure he's applying is appropriate. Already looking forward to my next appointment!

name: Perry Taylor
text: Good concept .   Yet the level of service is inconsistent and pricy for the level received.

resp.text: Hello Perry, we appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your recent experience with us. Our staff is trained to provide each of our guests with the highest caliber of customer service and professionalism, so we are concerned to learn about your visit. Please reach out to us directly at (256) 384-1178 or Mgr.huntsville@handandstone.com so we can discuss your experience further. We hope to hear from you soon.

name: Anilee Bailey
text: I went in for a prenatal massage. First, it was extremely clean and relaxing. Second, everyone there was incredibly nice. Third, the massage was amazing. I'm totally going back

name: Kesha Jones
text: My very first time coming here. Soon as I walked inside the ladies at the desk made me feel welcomed as they greeted me with a smile. I checked in and they gave me a form to fill out. As I was filling out the form one lady offered me water (mango water) and I said yes and she fixed it for me. About 5min later another young lady came over and told me where the restrooms where and explained to me how I can change the settings of the fan in the massage room and also the heating temperature on the bed... absolutely amazing customer service, very friendly staff, very relaxing and clean atmosphere. The Deep Tissue massage, Valindsia did a phenomenal job... I've had plenty massages at other places but this one was by far the best!!!! I left feeling like a brand new person, can't wait til my next appointment next month😁

name: Schinell Walker
text: First i must say i love this place,it  is clean and the staff is friendly i went in for a 3pm appointment and had MONICA doing my microdermabrasion facial she was AWESOME💯💯💯 as the process went by she gave me info on all the products she was using and what they were for i was so relaxed i almost fell asleep. I love her  and i highly recommend this place.

name: The Smith Adventures
text: My husband does their monthly package and we travel a lot so we have a chance to check out multiple Hand and Stone location. The staff at this location was very friendly and helpful. We both had a massage and I had a facial. Both of us were happy with our massages and I was happy with my facial. We live about 3m5 hours away but will be back again and make it a little mini getaway. Also be aware parking can be a bit tough at meal times as there are a lot of restaurants close.

name: Joëline Mpabwa
text: Katy was amazing!! My first time coming here and they made me feel welcomed. Katt was so on point with all my knots area and took special time to advise me on what I should do to help me with releasing the knots on my own time. I felt very comfortable and relaxed. Will definitely book again. I strongly recommend this place👍🏾

name: Empala “The Chevyweight” McCraw
text: Ask for Kat. You will not regret it.

name: Kendal Zabel
text: Not bad, I don't think they actually hit the one hour that was paid for. This was a gift and the person mentioned starting a little late and getting into her car at the one hour mark. With dressing, and walking out etc. I would say she prob got 40 min, paid for 60. Aside from that ... People were nice, clean facility, relaxing environment, experienced MT.

name: Empala “The Chevyweight” McCraw
text: Ask for Kat. You will not regret it.

name: Joëline Mpabwa
text: Katy was amazing!! My first time coming here and they made me feel welcomed. Katt was so on point with all my knots area and took special time to advise me on what I should do to help me with releasing the knots on my own time. I felt very comfortable and relaxed. Will definitely book again. I strongly recommend this place👍🏾

name: Anita Palmer
text: Best massage I’ve had in a while. Very knowledgeable in muscle groups and work on special problem areas.

resp.text: Anita, thanks for letting us know you had such a great experience! We hope to see you again soon!

name: Felecia Wright
text: I have really enjoyed the experience of being a member of Hand and Stone. I have enjoyed every visit and each therapist did a great job. They were all very professional however, my last visit was with Tangela.... and she was phenomenal!!! Her knowledge base was evident in her skills. She took the time before starting  to determine what was needed to benefit me most during my session by asking questions and listening. Thank you Tangela. It was a pleasure being your client! Although I am choosing  to find a facility closer to my home,I am sure I will visit again in the future.

name: Genea Flowers
text: I love Hand & Stone, everyone is always so nice and welcoming.  I especially love my massage therapist Terra she is top notch!

resp.text: It is always a pleasure to see you again, Genea! We appreciate your great feedback about Terra and our staff. Thanks again for the wonderful review!

name: Patience Samson
text: Several excellent massueses.

name: Vanessa Williams
text: I really enjoy the facial.  The lady (forgot her name) was so nice, and made me feel so special.

name: Allen Lastinger
text: The Hand and Stone do a fabulous job of making you feel welcome and comfortable. The wait is  short when you make an appointment. The facility is very clean and modern and the staff are friendly. The massage therapist was great and attentive to my needs. I will be back soon!

name: Kathleen Hair
text: Nice, quiet and relaxing. Gave 4 stars due to a billing issue that yet has been resolved.

name: Shannon Creel
text: My wife enjoyed the place I got it for her birthday

name: Christal Howard
text: Every time I’ve been here has always been a great experience.  Front desk personnel are great too!  We had a little SNAFU with my recent appointments and they worked everything out for my granddaughter and I.

resp.text: We work hard to ensure all of our guests receive the best treatment! Thank you for recognizing our efforts at Hand & Stone Huntsville and for the positive review! Have a great day!

name: Nichole Collins
text: I was so excited when I heard this place was opening. When I finally decided to come in, I was not disappointed! The front desk is very welcoming and knowledgeable, they answered all of my questions. The lobby is very homey and relaxing. I absolutely loved my massage! If you go, I recommend the Himalayan salt stones!

name: Amanda Simon
text: Love at first visit! The front desk ladies are so warm and welcoming. For me it feels like a visit with friends. My massage therapist is AMAZING! He helps me be my best self. By helping me relax, I can continue to be a great wife and mother to my little girls.

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review! We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your service at AL Huntsville! Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon!

name: Julie Shewmaker
text: I enjoy the facials at Hand and Stone and the variety of products/services they offer.  The only thing I do miss is the hand/arm/neck massage that was included at my previous Spa while the mask was working its magic! It may be that these are add-on options but I have not been made aware of them.

resp.text: It is always a pleasure to see you again! Thanks for the wonderful review and valuable feedback! We can't wait for your next visit!

name: Jasmine Spruill-Young
text:
I received a gift certificate to Hand and Stone. From booking online and choosing my massage therapist to the wonderful service received from Anthony to the actual massage, my experience at Hand and Stone was great. They have a wonderful ambiance when entering and great staff.

The massage therapist, Cat, read my intake form and listened when I discussed my problem areas. She provided me with tips when I'm between massages. Thanks so much for a great experience.

name: Anna Rosado
text: This was my first experience getting a professional massage and it was absolutely incredible!! Super kind and friendly staff, warm and serene rooms and very clean. I got the hot stone massage with Vielka and she did an outstanding job getting the knots out of my back and completely relaxed me. This place will be a regular part of my self-care routine!

name: Prinal Patel
text: Absolutely loved my visit to Hand & Stone! The front desk staff was super friendly. My massage was with Tangela, who was superb. I upgrade to an 80 minute Himalayan salt stone massage with her. I will never go back to a regular massage or a different therapist. The whole experience was fabulous!

name: Tasha Vineyard
text:
If I can I will Always add the scalp massage. Super soothing and relaxing. The whole experience was great and I'll definitely go back.

Editing my review to add that as a member I am never able to schedule a convenient appointment time online and that the staff turnover has not allowed me to schedule with the same massage therapist twice. I was charged for an appointment I wasn't at even though I called the day before to cancel. I spoke with someone earlier this week to cancel my membership and she said she would have the manager call me back when she came in , in a "little bit" that phone call was never returned . I get physician prescribed massages for anxiety  and since joining I've only been able to utilize my membership twice. I started out going to Journey in Madison but this was closer to my home, however after this experience I will be making the extra drive.

name: Christie Moore
text: Tangela was phenomenal!  This was my first massage and my oh my.  I was thrilled to find out that there was a membership that included monthly visits.  The staff was A+ from the moment I stepped through the door.  Can't wait for my next visit!!

name: Dakota Dunn
text: My experience was great! The place was very clean and the people were also so nice. If you want a massage I highly recommend Valindsia she done an amazing job for me!!!

resp.text: Thanks for highlighting our staff in your positive review! If there is ever anything else we can assist you with, please don't hesitate to reach out.

name: Adiana Cox
text: Fantastic establishment!  The environment is beautiful!, Clean, and comfortable!  The ladies are warm and friendly, and totally professional.  My first appointment was handled professionally and I was/am very happy with the result of my waxing.  I will return.

name: Andy Simon
text:
It was my first session although my wife goes here several times a week - she loves it. My masseur used the "Firm" setting and I gotta tell you it was great. My lower back had chronic pain and after my massage it is completely gone.

Very professional and relaxing atmosphere, effective massage - what more can you ask for ? I will be going back there.

name: Riley Couch
text: Amazing environment. As soon as I walked in I was greeted by Anthony and Sherie who welcomed me with smiles and kind words and answered all questions I had. Daniel did my massage and he had the hands of an Angel! Ended up buying a membership because it was that AWESOME! Best place in town!

name: Jessica Geisen
text: My experience was amazing from the moment I stepped in the doors! Every staff member was so courteous and knowledgeable and my session was completely tailored to my needs. Terra was absolutely amazing and I can’t wait to see her again in 2 weeks. I HIGHLY recc Hand and Stone Huntsville!

name: Kendria Jones
text: My husband and I had a wonderful experience. The couples massage is amazing. The therapist worked out kinks that I didn’t know I had. Truly enjoyed it.

name: Jennifer Gallagher
text: I had an amazing massage by Vielka. I would totally recommend her to anyone looking to book here. The spa is nice and conforms with all the other hand stone massage spa in the US. Super friendly staff as well! I will definitely be booking again in the future.

name: Ann Creager
text: Wonderful experience. Staff was so friendly and helpful. Daniel was great. I would recommend going to everyone!!

name: Tamyra Sampson
text: Great massage and servicd

name: Amber Young
text: Overall it was relaxing. I felt like the massage was more rubbing than massaging. As a runner I like massages to dig into all the overused muscles. Also, I paid extra for a peppermint scalp massage ($15). Although it felt good, it lasted for about 1 minute and my massage ended early. I arrived at 11:57 for my 12 o'clock appointment. I went back to the room around 12:10 for my 1 hour massage and additional scalp massage and i was released at 12:58. I feel like if you are going to pay for an extra service that should not take away from the original service you paid for. Pay more, get less does not seem like a good way to handle clients.

name: Suzanne Franco
text: Massage was great!!  Room was relaxing! Highly recommended

name: Heather Hamilton
text: The massage was good; however the add on of the cold stone face massage was a disappointment.  The initial towel was lukewarm instead of hot and the stones that are supposed to be placed under my eyes kept falling off.  It definitely was not worth the extra $15. I mentioned my disappointment to the masseuse and receptionist.

name: Bree Welch
text: Hand and Stone will forever be a part of my self care routine. Lovely staff, relaxing atmosphere, and very knowledgeable on all their practices, if you are curious I highly suggest just booking one appointment and your mind will be made up. Also they offer prenatal massages!

name: Joshua C. Francis
text: Awesome service. Very clean and serene setting. One of the best massages I have ever had.

name: Amber Parker
text: Great massage! Valindsia was very accommodating and ensured I was comfortable from beginning to end.

name: Parag Patel
text: I really love this place, the atmosphere is so calming and relaxing. It’s super clean and top notch. I have seen a few therapists, my favorites are Terra, Daryel and Paul

name: Vielka P
text: Love the Hot Stone! Very relaxing feeling good for muscle tightness and stress.

name: Charles Francis
text: Superb, one of the best I have ever been to around the world. Very clean, elegant, and professional. Highly recommend. Ask for Sara

name: Debbie Taylor
text: Had a facial today. Hannah did a great job! Will definitely be back

name: Zachary Maresh
text: My massage was decent but covered a limited range, and the person who massaged my girlfriend did not know what he was doing and kept rambling on about his life.

name: Jaylee Paulson
text:
My husband and I went for a couple's deep tissue massage deep tissue was seriously lacking. My husband travels extensively we just celebrated our 24th year
anniversary and my appointment was below par  for a $179 for a deep tissue massage.

resp.text: We're so sorry to hear about your experience, Jaylee. Our massage therapists are trained to provide professional, high quality service. We value your feedback and would love to discuss your recent visit further. When convenient, please reach out to us via phone or email at (256) 384-1178 or Mgr.huntsville@handandstone.com to do so.

name: Ashley Laurent
text: Monica did an EXCELLENT job on my facial. I HIGHLY recommend her, she is the best!!!!!! Very sweet and informative.

name: Monica Harrison
text: I've had many massages around the country but Vielka was the best! 5 stars!

resp.text: We are happy to hear you've found the perfect massage therapist for you! Thank you for sharing and we look forward to your next visit! Take care!

name: Taliyah Oglesby
text: Very relaxing massage with hot stones ! Ask for Ashley !

name: Donations Team
text: Absolutely love this place! We treat our team to a monthly massage with their corporate program. Our employees have loved seeing Terra, Daryel and Tangela. Their favorite massage is the Himalayan Salt Stone Massage. We highly recommend this place!

name: Marina Prucha
text: I had a wonderful experience here and highly recommended it. Courteous staff, great Himalayan stone massage and very clean.

resp.text: It is great to hear our wonderful staff was so considerate during your appointment! We hope to see you here again in the future!

name: Tracey Burnett
text: It’s the most relaxed I’ve been in a long time. Your staff is wonderful

name: Audra Atchley
text: Great facility & great bedside manner of the greeting staff. Actual services were okay. Not bad, but not great. But new establishment, may still be getting their groove.

name: M Ray
text: This was my first visit.  The staff were extremely professional and informative. They made me feel comfortable

name: lesha johnson
text: Catherine is the ABSOLUTE best!!! She has skillfull  hands!!

name: Jennifer Jones
text: This was my first time visiting Hand and Stone!  The staff was super friendly!  Daryel did a fantastic job!  I’ll definitely be back!  😀

resp.text: Jennifer, we're pleased to hear you were satisfied with your first experience with us! We will be sure to share your comments with Daryel and our team. Come back and see us again any time!

name: Kathy Duttweiler
text: Monica was awesome!  Great experience!   I'll definitely be back!

name: Jenna Stone
text: Wonderful experience! Daniel was the best!

name: Kassie West
text: I had a great massage with Tangela. She was awesome!!

name: vparker 38
text: Great calming environment every one was friendly and service was overall outstanding.

name: Ramon Cummings
text: It was a great experience! The staff was truly professional, nice and genuine.

name: Jane Bouldin
text: Great experience at Hand and Stone- I had a facial and shoulder massage.  Highly recommend!

name: CESTUS
text: Tangela was my therapist. It was my first visit to Hand and Stone Massage.  I was scheduled for back surgery the next day. Tangela made certain she had all the information needed to unsure I had the most comfortable, most effective and safest massage I could possibly receive. Besides the fact she was the best therapist I've ever had anywhere, she was courteous, caring and proffessional during my entire visit. I am really looking forward to my next visit to Hands And Stone massage, and I will definitely be scheduling my next visit with Tangela!

name: Cindy Coker
text: Amazing massage - best I've ever had!

name: Sara Jeffress
text: Feeling very relaxed after a massage and facial.

name: Jw Kennedy
text: Enjoyed the service. Great massage.

name: Carol Willis
text: Wonderful relaxing massage! Became a member so I can do this monthly.

name: Shelbrina76 Lomax
text: Staff is very welcoming and professional.

name: Brenda Styles
text: Awesome experience. Daryel was great!!

name: Mykel Drake
text: Great staff

resp.text: Mykel, thank you for the kind words and wonderful review! It brings us great joy to see our members and guests happy. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Dee’s Random Fandom
text: Awesome place very professional.

name: Erika Merino Phillips
text: Quality customer service, great massage

resp.text: Erika, thanks for letting us know you had such a great massage! We hope to see you again soon!

name: Sara Bonds
text: Love this place!

name: Jada Frazier
text: Peaceful and worth it!

name: Shewunikki Moton
text: Great experience there

resp.text: Shewunikki, thanks for letting us know you had such a great experience! We hope to see you again soon!

name: Jada Frazier
text: Peaceful and worth it!

name: hemlata patel
text: Is very nice

name: Nayeli Pineda
text: Maybe don't come here for bangs. I chose to come here instead of my Birmingham salon because I was only getting a trim and this was a highly rated salon. I got a bang trim and will be wearing hats for a while. My bangs had a cool look to them before, but now they are just blunt and lifeless. I don't know if my stylist just was not sure how to cut bangs or was only aware of one style of bangs but I feel really ugly. I'll be sure to just drive to my Birmingham salon next time.

name: Evelyn Maxey McCarter
text: Moving from Nashville made finding a hair salon near Demopolis, Alabama incredibly difficult. The girls at Image Makers are wonderful. Fair prices for the services, very talented at what they do!! Loving my highlights and the health of my hair!!

name: Anna Grace
text: I am not familiar with salons but I desperately needed a hair cut so thought i would come in to image makers. Asked for a trim and the lady cut 6 inches off and gave me layers without asking. I looked like an emo boy from 2005. I cried. DONT CUT CURLY HAIR IF YOU DONT KNOW HOW. this was a year ago and it still makes me mad. Wish i never went, my hair is still trying to get back to the way its always been.

name: Rachel Hunter
text: Hands down the #1 salon in Alabama! Great atmosphere, talented hair dressers/artist, and they treat you like family!! LOVE, LOVE, LOVE Image Makers!!

name: Teresa Grenawalt
text:
I’m so glad I found this salon! Thanks to all the other 5 star reviews. :) I’m new to Alabama so I’m really happy I found a great stylist on my first try.
I called to schedule and they got me in within an hour! I was not expecting a same day appointment. I saw Tiffany for highlights and a cut. She did an amazing job! She was very deliberate and thorough with my cut. She also helped me decide what to do with my hair since I didn’t have time to find pics due to how fast they got me in. I’m really happy with the outcome and will be back!
There’s a lot of construction in the intersection out front (August 2019) so leaving early to find parking and go around the detour is recommended.

name: Dustin Edwards
text: Good haircut

name: brandi bost
text: Hayley is absolutely AMAZING! She always does such a wonderful job with my hair- LOVE her! Not to mention she's super friendly and fun,  which makes the time fly by 😊

name: Tiffani Glenn
text: My favorite salon and favorite stylists..within 100 mile radius! You will not find a more friendly staff, especially that little cutie owner, Amy Page, who's always eating at the front desk with a smile!! Don't waste ur time shopping around..this is a one stop shop...for girls, guys, teens and kids. No matter what type of hair you have!! And while you are seated for your appointment, you can shop the most adorable boutique clothing and jewelry around...for 1/2 the price!

name: Will Little
text: Wonderful experience, amazing cut. Was in and out in no time.

name: E m Culp
text: Great haircut, Danielle did it, very pleased with her ability & the shop as a whole

name: jennifer bamberg-kistler
text: Fantastic salon! Great clothes and accessories! Love being able to combine getting a new outfit to compliment my fresh hair in one stop!

resp.text: Thanks for appreciating all we have to offer, Jennifer! You walked away looking fabulous which lets us know we've done our job. -Image Makers Team

name: Jordan White
text: Danielle Pierre is amazing.

name: Becky Hardesty
text: Great group of hairdressers

resp.text: Thanks for the support, Becky. Please let us know if there's ever anything we can do to help. -Image Makers Team

name: JERRY BURNETTE
text: Great place

name: Bethany Kersey
text: Love it

name: Love Abrams
text: pretty woman in there

name: Stanton Davis
text: Great massage today. I had Nate for deep tissue. I like a lot of pressure.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experience with Nate. We really appreciate it. He's the newest addition to our staff and your feedback will help people feel confident in picking him as their therapist.

name: Jessica Oliver
text: Rachel was so sweet and did a great job! Robert did not do my massage, but my mom said he was phenomenal! Thank you guys so much!

resp.text: Thank you letting everyone know how wonderful Rachael and Robert are. It'll help other people make an informed choice and help them draw clients. It's very appreciated.

name: Cody Walker
text: I have been going to stellar massage for a few months now and i have never been disappointed. I have had the privilege of having Jordan as my massage therapist and she is by far the best one i have ever been too. She is friendly,  informative and thorough. She goes over your paperwork before she starts to make sure she can best help any issues you may be having and she is informative if you inquire about the muscles that are being worked on.  I would 10/10 recommend her if you are ever considering a massage. the prices are also fair and you get your full monies worth.

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful review. Jordan is our newest therapist and it's reviews like yours that will let people know how amazing she is. I'll make sure she see's your shout out.

name: Arica White
text: My experience was absolutely wonderful. Becca is simply amazing, customer obsessed, and knowledgeable! Her hands are magic 🥰

resp.text: Thank you for sharing! I'll make sure Becca sees this. Everyone enjoys a good pat on the back.

name: Kiyah Herlong
text: I booked with Jordan because so many reviews were singing her praise.  I learned today that those praises were well deserved.  She was very polite and knowledgeable about massage therapy.  I have suffered from tension in my neck, shoulders, and back for a long time, but she was still able to apply the right amount of pressure to help loosen my muscles.  I will have to book more appointments so she can continue working out the tension, but I walked out today feeling better after just one session.  She was also true to the time and fulfilled my entire 60 minute massage.  The time spent completing the intake and getting ready did not take away from the hour.  After reading all of the positive reviews, I was impressed enough to join the massage club, which came with a $10 discount for today's session.  I look forward to booking future sessions with Jordan.  Jordan: if you see this, thanks again and job well done!

resp.text: Thank you Kiyah for the wonderful review and welcome to the club! It's reviews like yours that help people make an informed decision and makes us and our therapists a success.  Jordan is our newest therapist and reviews are essential in getting the word out so people know how great Jordan is. She'll be thrilled about your review. I'll make sure Jordan sees it.

name: Josh Taylor
text: The therapists cater to the patient's needs and provides exceptional service. Each therapist that I've met has been extremely nice. My wife and I purchased a membership after our first visit because we were so pleased. I've had the pleasure of Jordan as my massage therapist for each of my visits and she does exceptional work. I deal with frequent back pain and she gives thorough attention to my trigger points, while avoiding my sensitive herniated disc. I highly recommend her. My wife has been treated by both Jenae and Elaina, and was very pleased with their work as well. Their pricing is affordable and they provide great membership plans for people looking for recurring massages. Highly recommend all around.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing Josh. Current reviews are so important for letting people know where to go and is what enables us to thrive. We are so glad to have you as members and look forward to your next visit.

name: Ben Moffatt
text: We returned to Stellar Massage for a couples massage on our anniversary.  It was a wonderful hour.  It was very relaxing and the staff were great at making us feel comfortable and that health orders were taken seriously.  We can't wait to come back!

resp.text: It's such a privilege to be able to be part of your celebration. Thank you for choosing us and for letting everyone know about your experience.

name: Matt B
text: Extremely professional and courteuous. Pleasure to do business with.

resp.text: Thank you for the rating. Hope to see you again soon.

name: Unknown
text: Just found Stellar & Becca after my move & was extremely pleased. This is a group focused on "customer satisfaction." Be certain & read the information on the website so you get the type of massage you are seeking. The facility is welcoming, Becca is focused on helping you help your body, & the pricing is excellent. Highly recommend this establishment.

resp.text: Thank you Brenda for sharing your experience.   I try really hard to only hire people who are not only good therapists, but who share my customer service philosophy, but we couldn't succeed without clients like you letting people know about us. I'll make sure Becca knows you gave her a shout out.  We look forward to seeing you again.

name: Valisa Robinson
text: Favorite! I'd never go anywhere else.

resp.text: Thank you! We love hearing that. Glad you are happy and we look forward to having you back.

name: Rebecca Conner
text: Great massage and very friendly and helpful people working there. Austin was wonderful. I don't usually let men massage me. But he was only one available during time I wanted to go and he has great reviews on here so I took a chance. He made me very comfortable and he was very knowledgeable about how to help my neck issues. He was also very kind and gave a great massage. I highly recommend him and stellar massage;)

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful review and for giving Austin a shout out. I'm happy he was able to help. We hope to see you back soon.

name: JoAnne Gordon
text: I just had a fantastic massage with Chris. The 1st time I got a massage from 1 of the male therapists I was nervous but I got over that quickly. Both of the male therapists are very professional. They keep me covered better than female therapists I've had at other places. I feel so relaxed! Thank you Chris & thank you Stellar Massage. I will definitely be back!

resp.text: Thank you for the shout out JoAnne. Yes, a lot of people are uncomfortable going to a male. I'm glad you gave him/them a try and are comfortable now. We hope to see you back soon.

name: Victoria Schlensker
text: Just got done with our third couple’s massage at Stellar Massage. Every experience has been absolutely wonderful. We had Chris and Austin this time; both were extremely talented and gave fantastic relaxing massages. My boyfriend struggles with some shoulder problems that Austin took great care in addressing. And I thought Chris was the perfect balance of relaxing while still gently working out some knots I had. We are both looking forward to our next visit!

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experience.  It's reviews like yours that help others make an informed decision about who to choose, so it is because of you that we are able to succeed and grow. Thank you very much and we look forward to your next visit at our new offices.

name: Vince Elliott
text: Becca is the best.

resp.text: Yes, she is.  Thank you for sharing and letting other people know about her awesomeness.

name: Kim Romero
text: I recently moved the Helena area and was looking for a new LMT for both pain management care (from a previous car accident with orthopedic injury) as well as prenatal since I’m pregnant. This place was perfect! My therapist has been Jenae and she is absolutely amazing! Her technique is so relaxing and she’s been very accommodating for me! Not to mention this place is immaculately clean and they go above and beyond to sanitize (especially with COVID.) They offer a full range of services with different add-ons so I feel like there’s something for everyone. My advice would be to book in advance so they can accommodate you adequately. But overall, I plan to continue getting services here throughout my pregnancy and beyond. Highly recommend ⭐️

resp.text: Thank you Kim, it's been a pleasure having you in. I really appreciate the review. It's current reviews like yours that allow people to make an Informed decision on where to go and allow us to thrive. Thank you for helping to make us a success.

name: rm dehart
text: Convenient new location right off of Hwy 31. Love this place. Have had work by owner Jenae, Chris, and Becca. All are fabulous!! I have had many, many mediocre massages for back issues over the years, but not here...they have all been great! You won’t regret booking here, trust me.

resp.text: Thank you. I really appreciate you sharing your experience and helping people decide where to go to get their massage. It's clients like you that have made us a success and make being a massage therapist such a joy.

name: Lito Delmo
text: Tranquil, relaxed atmosphere.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review.  We try to have a homey, not a spa or medical atmosphere.  Thank you for sharing it. Hope to see you back soon!

name: Jan Hall
text:
An hour massage at chain massage franchises is really about 45 minutes. At Stellar, an hour massage is 60 minutes of massage. Stellar offers relaxation, deep tissue, DEEP deep tissue, prenatal, myofascial release and more.

It's a single location; the owner is 'hands on,' both as an owner and most excellent therapist. Male and female therapists are available. Booking is online, telephone or in person. A monthly club is available for savings. The facility is spotless. The therapists strive to deliver a personalized session and respond quickly to requests for lighter or heavier touch, or changes in the room such as the music or temperature.

I've been a member at Envy and Heights and have had massages at different spas. I've always felt cheated on time except at Stellar. I've had slapdash massages at every level. I'm very happy to have found an alternative to Envy and Heights that provides a quality service for a good price and lets me share my membership with my household.

resp.text: Thank you Jan for your wonderful review.  When I started the club I based it off what my clients were telling me they hated about other clubs.  That's why there is no contract, it can be shared and banked massages can be used after cancellation. We've enjoyed having you as a member and really appreciate you telling people about it.  It's reviews like yours that make us a success and allow others to make an informed decision when they choose where to get their massages.  Thank you!

name: Melissa J
text:
I couldn't be happier with Stellar Massage and Austin!

I've recently started using Stellar Massage and in particular, therapist Austin Painter. I highly recommend both Stellar Massage and him!

Stellar is very reasonable with their pricing, various types of massage styles/services and appointment times to work with almost every schedule. It's so easy to book online!!!

Austin is attentive, considerate, and talented. Highly skilled in finding problem areas and works very hard to make those spots heal and fix for the long term rather than a quick fix just to get by.

After 3 visits, I can tell a significant difference and I'm feeling so much better. I'm already looking forward to my next appointment!
Thank you Austin and Stellar Massage. Thank you!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the wonderful review! Austin is the newest addition to our staff, so feedback like yours is essential in spreading the word about how amazing he is, so people can make an informed decision when choosing a therapist. It's clients like you that make our work so rewarding and allow us to succeed and grow. Thank you, and we hope to see you back in soon.

name: Sarah Catt
text:
I found Stellar Massage through Google and after reading the reviews, decide to give it a try. Austin was my therapist and he was fabulous! I had a 90 minute message and he spent a lot of time on my problem areas (neck/back/shoulders).

He checked in with me throughout the massage to make sure I was comfortable and the pressure wasn’t to hard. He also spent some time after my massage to teach me some stretches for my neck. I can’t wait to go back!  Thanks Austin and Stellar Massage!

resp.text: We're so happy you found us and he was able to help you. We appreciate your sharing your experience as it's reviews like yours that make us successful. Everyone loves a pat on the back, so I'll make sure he sees this.

name: Elaine S
text: Kim is an excellent massage therapist. She is experienced and very knowledgeable.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experience, We really appreciate your helping to spread the word about us.

name: Laura Lewis
text: When it comes to a quality massage Stellar Massage is top notch! Chris is awesome! Don't go Groupon.. Stellar gives you variety, convenience and quality! Please try them out, Chris one of my favorites! He is thorough, professional and will provide you with that extra relaxation and stress-free feeling after he is done. Thanks Jenea for the continued professional service and staff.

resp.text: Thank you Laura for the shout out. It's clients and reviews like yours that allow us to thrive. We really appreciate you sharing your experience so others can make an informed decision when deciding where to go (and choose us). I'll make sure Chris sees this, as a pat on the back always feels good.

name: Courtney Culbreath
text:
I visited Stellar Massage for the first time on Sunday. Patrick is great at deep tissue massage (my appointment was for 60minutes)! He is a very fun and professional guy!
In conclusion, it's probably one of the best massages I've had, especially in Birmingham! I would recommend to anyone. Also, the ease of making an appointment and the friendly staff was much appreciated! My back and shoulder feels so much better now! Thanks guys!

resp.text: Patrick's first review!!! Thank you so much for letting people know how wonderful he is. It's reviews like yours that will help him build his (and Stellar Massage's) clientele.  We couldn't do it without you. Thank you.

name: Rebekah Brophy
text: My boyfriend and I had massages at Stellar last Sunday.  His therapist was Kaitlyn and mine was Chris.  I want to start out by saying Chris was very professional, receptive to my needs, thorough and communicative.  It was one of the best massages I've ever had and I would highly recommend him.  My boyfriend was very happy with his time with Kaitlyn.  He said that she worked on all the areas he had asked and that the pressure was perfect.  I'm definitely going back again.  Thank you Stellar!

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing your experience.  Current feedback is essential to help people make a choice and I know that Kate and Chris will appreciate the shout out and it always feels good to be praised.  I will make sure they see it.

name: Amber Henderson
text: Stellar Massage is not near my home nor my office, but I will always go out of my way to get a massage here. It's so convenient to book online, and the hours are great! They have so many wonderful massage therapists, including several who do excellent deep-tissue massages. They really get to know their clients and always make me feel so welcome. Thank you!

resp.text: I'm embarrassed to reply so late. Not sure how I missed 4 reviews, but Google pointed them out. Better late than never?  Thank you for sharing and we hope we will see you back soon.

name: Dawn Cole
text:
Christopher gives a wonderfully relaxing massage. Love the atmosphere -- very quiet and soothing environment -- exactly what I am looking for in a spa.
UPDATE;  Just had probably the best facial ever!  So relaxing and my skin is glowing -- got a GREAT neck and shoulder massage, arms, hands.
So look forward to my monthly massage and monthly facial!

resp.text: Thank you for sharing.  I'm so happy you found us!

name: Roger Lay
text: It was my first massage in a very long time. All the staff I met were very courteous and kind. The massage I received from Sally was amazing. I have already booked my next massage. Thank you

resp.text: So glad to have you back! I'm glad you were so happy with her. Thank you for sharing your experience with us and helping others make an informed choice.

name: Gwynne Mountz
text:
I purchased the birthday special massage (90 minutes for the price of 60) for my husband's birthday this year. He has multiple sclerosis and does not have feeling in parts of his legs, his feet or his hands. He also can not lie flat on his back without experiencing extreme vertigo. I let Kerri, his masseuse, know that he had these issues ahead of time.

Kerri was great!! My husband said she had lots of pillows to accommodate his back. He said that she was very gentle (some masseuse's like to manhandle you). He said that in the areas where he did not have feeling due to his MS that when she would massage that area that for a brief moment, his feeling returned. He had nothing but positive things to say about the entire experience. I am thinking of signing him up for the club membership so he can go on a regular basis. We are thinking that it might actually help his MS.

Definitely get your next massage here!

resp.text: Thank you Gwynne, I thought Kerri would be a terrific match for his needs.   Thank you for helping to spread the word about what a great, nurturing therapist Kerri is.  It's reviews like yours that help people with specific needs make a choice when they look for a place to get help or give themselves a treat. I'll make sure she sees it.  I know it will make her feel good to know she made a difference.  I hope you do take advantage of the club to get him regular massage at a reduced price.

name: Chelsey Sterling
text: Received a gift certificate for my birthday to Stellar Massage.  My brother chose the place because of all the wonderful reviews and I was not disappointed.  I had never had a massage before and didn't really know what I wanted.  April was able to walk me through the process and provide an amazing relaxing experience.  She was so knowledgeable about muscles and connectivity, it was so interesting to talk with her about the process.  She was excellent.  I am moving out of Birmingham in a few days and she really helped me relax from the stress of moving!  Wonderful experience!

resp.text:
Thank you Chelsey for the great feedback!  It took me 4 months to find April and it's good to hear from pleased clients. I'm just sorry you didn't find us until you were on the brink of moving.  Good luck in your new home.

Jenae

name: Lindsay Eshelman
text: I had my first massage ever this morning! Becca made me feel so comfortable and made sure I left relaxed! I am so happy I chose to go to Stellar Massage and will definitely be back!

resp.text: I'm glad you were comfortable and you enjoyed your massage so much.  I'll make sure Becca sees this and knows you were singing her praises.  It always feels good to get a pat on the back. We look forward to your next visit.

name: Abby Summerlin
text: Katelyn was awesome!! I've never had a massage before and Katelyn was so informative. She was constantly asking if the pressure she was using was just right and very aware of the places that needed more work. She knew every answer to every question I asked and was willing to answer them. Amazing massage!

resp.text: I'm so glad your first experience was such a good one.  Thank you for the review.  It's reviews like yours that help people make a decision on where to go for service and allows us to grow.  I'll make sure Kate sees your review, I know that it will make her happy to see it.

name: Diane Bellew
text: Great massage!   Moved to the area and loved getting a deep tissue massage over the weekend.  Just was these tired muscles needed. Loved it so much I joined the massage club for a monthly massage.

resp.text: Thank you Diane for sharing your experience with us.  We're excited to have you as a part of our club.  We look forward to your next visit!

name: Adrienne Thomas
text: I called to get a couple massage scheduled and the young lady that I spoke with was nice and tried to schedule something for us. I called back to confirm the time the second lady that answered the phone was rude, nasty, and loud in my ear. I never been spoke to this way ever in my life. The communication between the employees need to be better.

resp.text:
I'm sorry this happened. I assure you that our answering service is not in the habit of being rude or we would have a different answering service. I sent a screenshot of your review to them to find out who the operator was so they can talk to her. Unfortunately, since we don't have your name in our scheduling system we don't have a name or phone number to use to find your call and see who answered, but hopefully someone will remember your call.

Edited to add:  We found your calls and I have reviewed them.  I understand that it is annoying to call and be told there is available time, then be told something different when you call back.  She was confused because you were offered an 8:30 spot for 2, and our shortest couples massage is 60 minutes.  She should have clarified that you wanted 60 minutes instead of assuming it and she has been coached on how she should have handled the call.

I would have ended now with an apology and an attempt to make you happy if your complaint was about the error, but that isn't what your review stated.  After listening, she sounded totally confused, was stammering, and could have chosen her words better, but I do not believe "rude, nasty" or "I never been spoke to this way ever in my life." apply to the situation since her tone was confused, not attitude.  "loud in my ear" may be fair because her voice was louder than the first operator, but she did not raise her voice, the volume was just louder.

Viewers, judge for yourself (I'm sorry I can't attach the audio so you can see she did not raise her voice or have attitude). It was less than a minute.

Thanks for holding, I apologize for that waiting time, how may I help you?"

Um I just called just like 2 minutes ago and I talked to someone and they said they had, that they could probably do something at 8:30, tonight for 2 people.

They said they were going to try to do something to, hold on just, you talked to? hold on. (pause for a breath) Maam, we don't, we don't have an opening at 8:30 because they close at 9:00. You have to have it done before.

So who did I talk to?

aa, you spoke to another of our our our other operators.  Yeah, she spoke with you, but you won't be able to do that.

OK, cause she told me something else but I will go with another massage place thank you bye bye

name: Jason Schmersahl
text: Was my first experience with a deep tissue massage and Kate did a great job. She explained what to expect and really worked on a couple of my main trouble areas. She was very professional and the place has a great relaxing atmosphere. I will definitely be coming back.

resp.text: Thank you so much Jason.  I know Kate will appreciate you sending the word out about her and I appreciate the good word about Stellar Massage in general.  I'll make sure she sees this.  We hope to see you back soon.

name: Trisha Dailey
text: I've been massaged by both Rebecca and Chris now and they're both supurb! Relaxing atmosphere, great people!

resp.text: Thank you Trish! So glad you've been happy. I'll tell them you gave them a shout out. It always feels good to get a pat on the back. I'll give myself a pat on the back too for hiring them, it was a good decision.

name: Nancy Dorman-Hickson
text: I took advantage of Stellar Massage's birthday special: a 90 minute massage for the price of an hour. Katelyn Goodwin is a wonderful masseuse. She knows exactly how to get the kinks out without the kind of too-intense pressure some think is necessary. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you Nancy for sharing your experience and letting people know about our Birthday Special! I'll make sure Kate sees your review.  A pat on the back always feels good, and your review will help other people when making a decision about where to go for a massage and who to ask for.  Thank you.

name: Marie Mathews
text: I had an awesome experience today at Steller Massage! Katelyn gave an excellent deep tissue massage. She was very professional and focused on my problem areas. I will definitely go back!

resp.text: Thank you Marie for sharing your experience with Kate. Current feedback is essential to our continued success and we really appreciate it. We look forward to seeing you again!

name: HAROLD WILLIAMS
text: I used  Sally at Stellar Massage this past Saturday. She is a heck of a massage therapist. I left there feeling very rejuvenated as her style suited me.  She can go as deep as I need her to  while at the same time relaxing my muscles and relieving a ton of built up stress. Highly recommend her services.

resp.text: Thank you Harold.  Sally is our newest addition and was a wonderful find. I'm so happy she was such a good fit for you.  Thank you for sharing and letting people know how wonderful she is.

name: Brett Andrews
text: I joined the Stellar Massage monthly club this year and I look forward to my massage every month.  When I started my monthly massages, my shoulder was extremely sore and I had pain lifting my arm above my head.  I am happy to say, I have no pain in my shoulder now.  My last 3 appointments have been with Patrick and I have been extremely satisfied with his deep tissue massages.  Patrick has experience working with college athletes and it shows.  He knows where all of my tight and sore muscles are and knows how to massage the tension away.  I always leave feeling relaxed and stress free.  On top of that, I was able to schedule my last massage 4 hours before my appointment.  I really appreciate Patrick's availability and the convenient online scheduling.

resp.text: I'm so happy I was able to help.  It's people like you that make this vocation so satisfying.  I hope to see you again for maintenance and not because you are hurting.

name: Jessica Canterbury
text: After spending tons of money and time trying to find someone one who could actually give me a wonderful massage that helped relieve my back and neck pain, I FINALLY found Laura at Stellar. She really listened and really made sure to focus on the parts of my back and neck that were troubling me the most. She was very professional but also so easy to relax with, which I've had trouble with in the past with other massage therapists. She's got extremely fair prices and she's incredibly good at what she does. I will definitely be back.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experience with Laura.  Laura only recently joined us at Stellar Massage and reviews like yours will really help spread the word about her.  Thank you so much, and I know she will be happy to see your review as well.

aa, you spoke to another of our our our other operators.  Yeah, she spoke with you, but you won't be able to do that.
