name: Tara Watson
text: OMG! I had the BEST Deep Tissue massage ever. First time I felt so relaxed and pain free. Austin massaged parts of my body that I didn't know was so important in daily routines. Looking forward to my next appointment once healed up from my surgery.

resp.text: Thank you Tara for the feedback. Austin IS wonderfu and I'm happy he was able to help you. As our newest therapist your feedback is very important in helping spread the word about how good he is so that people will feel good about picking him as their therapist. It is greatly appreciated. I'll make sure he see's this. A pat on the back is always welcome.

name: Kendall Early
text: My fiance and I went in for a couples massage and it was perfect. They were friendly and they service was excellent. My fiance had Patrick and I had Meredith, both were extremely professional and catered to our individual needs. I have nothing but nice things to say about this place. I would definitely recommend it!

resp.text: Thank you for sharing Kendall.  Feedback like yours is essential in getting the word out and I really appreciate your recommendation.

name: Lindsey Johnston
text: My job is tough on my neck shoulders and back. I have seen 2 different massage therapists at Stellar and they have both been amazing. I always leave feeling more relaxed and realigned.

resp.text: Lindsey, thank you for sharing your experience with us. Clients like you are what makes being a massage therapist so satisfying and reviews like this is what helps us be successful. We really appreciate it and you.

name: Trisha Dailey
text: I've been massaged by both Rebecca and Chris now and they're both supurb! Relaxing atmosphere, great people!

resp.text: Thank you Trish! So glad you've been happy. I'll tell them you gave them a shout out. It always feels good to get a pat on the back. I'll give myself a pat on the back too for hiring them, it was a good decision.

name: Kristi Booth
text: Wonderful massages tailored to your needs, they listen to how much pressure  you want and to the areas that you want worked on.

resp.text: Thank you Kristi for sharing your experience. I'm glad you've been happy with the therapists you've used.  We hope to see you back in soon.

name: CJM
text: Jenae at Stellar Massage is great!  She encourages you to communicate how you feel throughout the massage and she explains how the techniques benefit your body. I really enjoyed my  massage and left feeling more knowledgeable about to make each massage last in between sessions. Thanks Jenae!

resp.text: Thank you for your rating CJ

name: Horatio Murphy
text: Met a buddy in Birmingham to golf.   Also scheduled both of us for a massage at Stellar Massage as we both would need it after golfing.   Jenae and April were very nice and professional.   The setting was nice and relaxing.   Both therapists were very knowledgeable.  I would highly recommend them to anyone looking for true massage therapy.   The reviews on here were very helpful in me choosing Stellar Massage,  thanks to the community and thanks to Stellar Massage!

resp.text: Thank you Horatio.  I'm glad we were able to get you and your friend in at the same time.  It was a pleasure meeting you both and I hope you will come back in next time you are in town. Jenae

name: Tiffany Bell
text: Although the massage was great what I got of it the therapist was all over the place with time, selling me a product, and talking to me the entire time. I went in for an hour long massage and even showed up 30 minutes before my appointment. We started at 6:30 where I was told I would do 30 minutes on my back and then 15 minutes on each side. I got 30 minutes on my back and was told my time was coming to an end. I told her I requested an hour. Then she only did 5 minutes on each side. I then asked again I requested an hour. She told me it was 45 minutes long and still charged me for an hour. I probably won't be back because I was not late. We started on time. I got charged for an hour I didn't receive. Maybe if I had someone more focused and calculate time I may have had a better review.

resp.text: Tiffany, I'm sorry.  This is not normal for us.  No matter what kind of day your therapist was having you should not have had your massage cut short.  Our policy is to ALWAYS give you the full amount of time even if you are a few minutes late (which you weren't).  It would have been better for her to ask me to take her massages than for this to happen.  I have addressed this and assure you that it will not happen again.  I hope you felt a little better after our phone call and will give us another chance to show that we are worth our 5 star rating. *Edited to add that this therapist is no longer working at Stellar Massage.

name: Kendall Early
text: My fiance and I went in for a couples massage and it was perfect. They were friendly and they service was excellent. My fiance had Patrick and I had Meredith, both were extremely professional and catered to our individual needs. I have nothing but nice things to say about this place. I would definitely recommend it!

resp.text: Thank you for sharing Kendall.  Feedback like yours is essential in getting the word out and I really appreciate your recommendation.

name: Mr Smith
text:
Lady was 15 minutes late and massage wasn't good.
Edited to add.
It was under a different name  for my appointment. I don't post my actual information for Google reviews.
It was at your location and may have been the woman you fired. This was 3 years ago though.... Would have been good to get a response maybe around the time I left review.

resp.text:
Edited to add:  The name and picture on this review used to be a female that looked like the therapist I referred to in my response. I'm glad I reviewed my old reviews.

You are not on our client list.  Did you perhaps leave a review for the wrong business?

I suspect that this is a massage therapist that I had to let go after two months and who recently (5 days ago) gave me as a reference, telling the new perspective employer that she worked for me for 10 months in 2016 and left because of the hours scheduled when she actually worked with Stellar Massage for 2 months in 2015 and was terminated due to reliability and performance problems (the 11/28/15 2* review was about her and to date is the only bad review related to the massage received).  I noted on my personal Facebook page on 1/31 that I was mystified as to why she would have given me as a reference.

name: Lynn Shanks
text: My first massage with Christopher was this past Saturday. I have been to several massage therapist recently. The problem was either the atmosphere was not pleasant or the location was not optimal. I am glad to say that the massage with Christopher with Stellar Massage was pretty much perfect. The location and atmosphere was great and I can't say enough about the massage. It was great. My pain was down as was my stress. I have already scheduled my next massage with him.

resp.text: I'm embarrassed to reply so late. Not sure how I missed 4 reviews, but Google pointed them out. Better late than never? Thank you for sharing your experience. Chris will be back after he gets his COVID vaccine and we hope we will see you back soon.

name: Kerri Davis
text: I have had many different massages in the past several years but hands down, if you like deep tissues massages (the only kind I buy) then Katelyn  (Kate) Goodwin is the best of the best!!!  I followed her even when she changed locations.  I don't mind driving a little farther for a fantastic massage!

resp.text: Thank you Kerri!  Kate is rather awesome and was a wonderful find.  Thank you for sharing your experience with her and letting everyone else know how wonderful she is.

name: chris miller
text: My wife surprised me with a couples massage for our one year anniversary, I was skeptical because we'd never gotten a massage.  Ally was my masseuse,  Kate massaged my wife. We couldn't imagine a better massage! They were extremely professional and made sure we were comfortable the entire time. We will DEFINITELY be back!

resp.text: I'm so happy we could give you such a good first experience and be part of celebrating your first anniversary.  Thank you for the good words.  I'm sure it will help others in choosing who to go to for their massages.  I'll make sure Kate and Ally see your praises of them.  Hope to see you both back again soon.

name: Jonathan Francke
text: Had a great second visit to stellar massage. I was in need of a deep tissue and that is exactly what I got. Chris was very knowledgable and hit all my problem areas. It was one of the deepest massages I've had. Often therapists have difficulty going deep enough with me, but this was not the case. I will definitely return when I feel things tightening up again. I picked Stellar for the reviews and was not disappointed. Thank you

resp.text: I'm embarrassed to reply so late. Not sure how I missed 4 reviews, but Google pointed them out. Better late than never? Thank you for sharing your experience. Chris will be back after he gets his COVID vaccine and we hope we will see you back soon.

name: Horatio Murphy
text: Met a buddy in Birmingham to golf.   Also scheduled both of us for a massage at Stellar Massage as we both would need it after golfing.   Jenae and April were very nice and professional.   The setting was nice and relaxing.   Both therapists were very knowledgeable.  I would highly recommend them to anyone looking for true massage therapy.   The reviews on here were very helpful in me choosing Stellar Massage,  thanks to the community and thanks to Stellar Massage!

resp.text: Thank you Horatio.  I'm glad we were able to get you and your friend in at the same time.  It was a pleasure meeting you both and I hope you will come back in next time you are in town. Jenae

name: Leslie Bierman
text: Kate is amazing! Having so much trouble with my back lately. She helped me so much! I'll definitely be back. Highly recommend!!

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experience! It's comments like yours that help people make an informed choice and allows us to thrive. I'll make sure Kate sees this. It always feels good to know we are appreciated.

name: anita fidai
text: The person on the phone was rude! Could not understand a simple I need a message appointment. And actedshady! !

resp.text:
I'm sorry you felt this way. Our clients are usually quite happy with our answering service.  I will talk to the manager about it. I'm glad you were able to come in on short notice though.

edited...I talked to the manager and the operator who took the call.  I wish you had brought this up to me when you came in for your massage so we could have talked about it.  All I know is what they told me, which is that the first time you called you hung up after being told we required a credit card to hold your appointment and you said you'd never had to do that for an appointment.  Since you hadn't been to us prior, I assume you meant elsewhere.  Unfortunately, we had to begin requiring a credit card due to a large number of people no-showing for their appointments.  I'm glad you called back to book and were able to get your massage.

name: Vanessa Ardan
text:
The best massage ever! My husband and I got a couple's massage for our anniversary and we couldn't be happier with the experience.
Crystal was my massage therapist and she is the best ;) definably coming back.

resp.text: Thank you Vanessa for letting people know how happy you were with Crystal and with Kate.  I'm glad we could be part of your celebration and we hope to see you back soon!

name: KAY DP
text: Had an awesome experience. I scheduled a relaxation/deep tissue and foot massage with Jenae as a surprise for my husband. He loved it. Jenae was professional, had great customer service, and made him feel comfortable.  I'm so glad that my google search led me to Stellar Massage for my husband's first massage ever. We will definitely be back!

resp.text: Oops, I somehow didn't see this review.  Sorry it took so long to say Thank you. I really appreciate you sharing your experience and letting people know about us.

name: Sarah Briley
text: My husband and I both had massages with Sally this weekend and she is great! I had a prenatal that was so relaxing and just what I had needed.  My husband injured his leg earlier in the week and it had been swollen and painful for days and was so much better after Sally worked on it.  Can't wait to go back!

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experiences. It's feedback like yours that helps others make an informed choice and allows us to flourish. We really appreciate it. I will make sure Sally sees this, I know it will make her happy to see it.

name: Marks Davidson
text: Crystal gave me the best deep tissue massage I've had in a long time. She was professional and attentive to my needs. I will definitely recommend Crystal and Stellar Massage to everyone, and will be going back soon!

resp.text: Thank you for helping to spread the word about us.  We really appreciate it and look forward to your next visit.

name: jane j
text: Laura was amazing. She focused on my right shoulder (at my request) and really relieved some of the pain I was feeling. She also had a very soothing voice/energy which helped me to relax.

resp.text: Thank you Jane for sharing your experience with Laura. She's been a blessing to Stellar Massage and we appreciate you helping to spread the word about us and her in particular.  We hope to see you again soon.

name: Latraunda Smith
text: Ive always had a pleasant experience here. Nice and inviting every visit and I love Kate's services! Is would highly recommend this place!

resp.text: Thank you Latraunda.  Kate IS amazing. It's clients like you that make us love what we do and reviews like yours that help us thrive.  We look forward to your next visit.

name: mark chapman
text:
4 different people (in my about 20 visits) have had the unique honor of working on my stiff neck at Stellar. All were wonderful--although warning if you are a wimp don't let the owner work on you, she is not gentle, but you will feel better later.

I review places as I see them--good and bad--I have been a customer for about 3 to 4 years there seems to be an expanding set of options and I have strayed but keep returning because it is consistently a good massage in a clean pleasant setting (new place better than old)--only fault I would have is setting an appointment online--site could be better--but there is always the phone--it works--I recommend

resp.text: Thank you Mark for the feedback.  I do tend to be a bit firm.  I feel like if someone is in pain and looking for relief that I'm cheating them if I do not work to their tolerance level.  I've been pretty happy with the quality of the massages of the people I hire.  I'm sorry you've had trouble with the on-line booking. Most of the problems people have had were with the mobile version because you can't see as much on the screen.  I moved the "Book Now" button from the bottom of my template to keep people from thinking it was the final click to booking the massage.

name: Dee X
text: I've been to many different massage therapists but I will have to say this is by far the best ones yet. I had Kate as a massage therapist and she did an awesome job with deep tissue, trigger point/neuromuscular therapy massage. I am definitely going back there in a heartbeat. I highly recommend this place. I am sure all the other therapists are just as great. Jenae did a wonderful job choosing get therapists. Definitely a 5+ star. Thanks for the wonderful service!

resp.text: Thank you Dee.  Kate has been with us a couple years now and has been a great part of our team.  I was lucky to find her.  Thank you for sharing.  It's current reviews like yours that help people make their choice and allows us to thrive.  We hope to see you back soon.

name: Ashley Salter
text: I have been struggling with back and neck pain for the past two months and was not getting lasting relief from sessions with my chiropractor.  I called and set up an appointment to see Kate at Stellar Massage.  I was able to get a same-day appointment and the staff I spoke with over the phone was both polite and helpful.  Upon arriving, Kate listened carefully to my concerns regarding my back and neck, and the specific areas that were giving me the most pain.  She showed me some diagrams and explained some of the muscle areas that could be causing the pain.  The deep tissue massage with Kate was the best massage I’ve ever had.  Throughout the session Kate communicated with me regarding the amount of pressure and what specific areas were continuing to trouble me.  Before I left, she showed me some stretches that I can do to alleviate some of my back and neck pain.  In my opinion, Kate went above and beyond just the hour massage I paid her for.  My back felt better when I left that day and I am still experiencing positive results from my massage with Kate.  I highly recommend Kate!

resp.text: Thank you Ashley for your wonderful and detailed review.  It's reviews like yours that have allowed Stellar Massage to grow and be able to hire wonderful therapists like Kate, and it will help people when they need to choose a therapist.  I know Kate will be thrilled to see your review.  I'll make sure she sees it.

name: Shannon Moran
text: I made an appointment today to get an hour massage, showed up to be informed the person   I was scheduled with doesn't work Saturdays. Not a good impression since I'm from out of town. They offered me a free massage, but could not since I'm leaving tomorrow. Would not recommend, need to collaborate and communicate efficiently.

resp.text:
I wish mistakes never happened.  Unfortunately they do, and when they do I try my best to make it up.  I offered profuse apologies and a free massage, but she couldn't come in later or on another day.  If I could have taken the massage, or called someone in, I would have.  Upon investigating we determined that if the resolution of the monitor is not correct, the shading showing a therapist is unavailable does not show.

I do not take these mistakes lightly and try my best to keep them from happening.  We have an answering service answer the phone when I am busy (I was in session).  They have operators who are trained to make appointments for us. My clients have overwhelmingly responded that they prefer the answering service to having to leave a message and wait for a reply.  They are the third, and by far the best I've had so far. I can't promise they will never make another error, but I can promise that if they do I will do my best to make it up.

name: Marks Davidson
text: Crystal gave me the best deep tissue massage I've had in a long time. She was professional and attentive to my needs. I will definitely recommend Crystal and Stellar Massage to everyone, and will be going back soon!

resp.text: Thank you for helping to spread the word about us.  We really appreciate it and look forward to your next visit.

name: Lauren Sisler
text: I have been going to Stellar Massage now for a few months.  They have a wonderful staff that pays attention to detail. Both Jenae and Crystal have been outstanding. I also really like the monthly/weekly membership offers.  It saves money and allows you the flexibility to come more/less based on your schedule while paying the lower membership cost with no contract obligation.

resp.text: Thank you Lauren.  It's been a joy having you come in.  It's reviews like yours that help people choose to come to us and I really appreciate you spreading the word.  You are a big part of the reason I was able to add another staff member to our team.  She will be starting in a week and I think you'll love her too.

name: Cindy Hall
text: My experierce was great! My son gave me the massage for my birthday!  Best gift ever, Kelley did my relaxing massage, I am an RN and I would recommend this to everyone.  Treat yourself or your loved one, well worth the money.  Totally professional and a great atmosphere.

resp.text: Thank you Cindy, I really enjoyed having you come in.  I'm glad I was able to help. We'll be posting a Mother's Day special soon if you want to give your son a little hint :>

name: Ashley Chapman
text: I saw Chris on Friday with the expectations that my sciatica would ease up and my expectations were met! He is extremely professional and polite and did an amazing job on the massage. I will definitely be going back and would recommend.

resp.text: I'm so glad Chris was able to help you with your sciatica! Thank you for sharing your experience and helping people make their decisions on where to when they need a good massage.  We look forward to your return.

text:
Lady was 15 minutes late and massage wasn't good.

It was under a different name  for my appointment. I don't post my actual information for Google reviews.
It was at your location and may have been the woman you fired. This was 3 years ago though.... Would have been good to get a response maybe around the time I left review.

resp.text:
Edited to add:  The name and picture on this review used to be a female that looked like the therapist I referred to in my response. I'm glad I reviewed my old reviews.

You are not on our client list.  Did you perhaps leave a review for the wrong business?

I suspect that this is a massage therapist that I had to let go after two months and who recently (5 days ago) gave me as a reference, telling the new perspective employer that she worked for me for 10 months in 2016 and left because of the hours scheduled when she actually worked with Stellar Massage for 2 months in 2015 and was terminated due to reliability and performance problems (the 11/28/15 2* review was about her and to date is the only bad review related to the massage received).  I noted on my personal Facebook page on 1/31 that I was mystified as to why she would have given me as a reference.

name: Hillary Mecham
text: I had the best massage I've ever had in my life.  Patrick was very professional and was able to tailor my massage to my needs by the questions he asked me and his own expertise.  I will definitely be returning!  Thank you!

resp.text: Thank you Hillary for the wonderful review!  We try our best to address the problem areas you identify during your intake.  I'm glad you were so happy with your massage.   Patrick is pretty amazing.

name: LV76 LV76
text: I received  a massage on 3/3/18 from Kate. The massage brought to light just how tight my shoulders, back and hips were. She worked my problem areas and as I was leaving, I could really tell how much more relaxed my body felt. I highly recommend checking out Stellar Massage.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing. There's nothing like a massage to find all your sore areas. I'm glad Kate was able to make you feel better.

name: Lily Laces
text:
Thanks to Kate, I am now no longer in pain, and happiest I have been in a long time. Today was my first ever massage appointment, and I am so glad I finally built the courage to do it. For months I have been in horrible back pain, and in the last two weeks it just got worse and worse, to were I was crying in agony.
I tried muscle relaxers and anti inflammatory pills, but, of course, that was just a temporary fix.
Now, I am the happiest I have been in months, pain free, and already looking forward to booking my next appointment for next month. Kate is a miracle worker; she was polite, professional, left me feeling at ease and relaxed, and made sure I was comfortable.
Afterwards she gave me advice on home exercises I can do till my next visit.
I will definitely be recommending her to my fellow friends and stylist. 🤓👍❤

resp.text: Thank you Lily for sharing your experience.  I'm so glad Kate could help you.  I will make sure Kate sees this review.  I know it will make her feel good, not just for the shout out, but it's very satisfying to know you made a difference in someone's quality of life. Thank you for letting people know how wonderful she is and helping spread the word about her and Stellar Massage.

name: Helen M. Dupree
text: Massage?  Relaxation?  Probably the best I've ever had in my travels across the U.S.  If you're ever in Birmingham, be sure to put this on your list of "Must Do!"  You won't be sorry!

resp.text: I'm so glad you enjoyed it!  Thank you so much for leaving feedback, it's such a help for growing our business.  I hope to see you back during your next visit.

name: Solida Saranko
text: My husband and I came in for our first time ever couples massage for our anniversary and I have to say it was an amazing experience! Kerri done a fantastic job on my key points. Thank you Kerri!

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experience with Stellar Massage.  We perform a lot of couples massages and try our best to make it a wonderful shared experience. We also offer couples massages in separate rooms in case you don't want to share in your partners snoring.  We hope it will be the first of many and that we will see you both again soon.

name: Patrick Cox
text:
We loved the massages at Stellar, the therapists  were incredibly gifted.
The atmosphere was warm and inviting. We will go back to get another couples massage.

resp.text: I'm so glad Ally and Chris were able to make your experience such a good one.  Thank you for letting everyone know how talented they are.  We look forward to your next visit.

text: Sally used a variety of techniques to ease the tension in my back. She seemed very experienced, and I walked out feeling like I had a new back. The online booking system with Stellar Massage is very convenient.

text: Had my first massage at Stellar yesterday. I travel with my job which requires a lot of driving. I have been suffering from back problems for several months. I've been going to the chiropractor since April with not much relief. I woke up this morning pain-free! Patrick was awesome!!!!!!!! I'm already looking forward to my next visit.

resp.text: Thank you Dawn for letting people know how wonderful Patrick is.  I'm glad he was able to give you relief.  We look forward to your next visit.

name: Leigh ann Clifton
text: Patrick came to our office today to give chair massages to our staff.  He did a great job.  It was very relaxing.  He was extremely professional, and would definitely recommend.

resp.text: He really enjoyed doing chair massage for your employees.  We all find it very rewarding to be a part of such a treat for them.  Thank you for inviting us.

name: Gennie Lee
text: I suffer from back pain, insomnia and anxiety. I needed tension relief. It was already 3pm and most were closing for the day. Another, some wanted membership for 6 mos. and some waiting period of 2-4 wks. Can a girl just have a back massage? I dont know how I end up finding Stellar Massage thru Google, but I'm so GLAD I did. I was able to book an appointment EASILY ONLINE SAME DAY. I was nervous since I never had male massage therapist. Let me tell y'all something, this man named AUSTIN PAINTER is amazing!! Very professional, courteous, knowledgeable. Austin, made everything so easy I totally forgot my stressful day. Thanks to Stellar Massage and Austin, when I got home I slept like a baby. Reasonable price, awesome service and open late to accommodate who gets off work late. Thank you and will be making more appointments in future!!!

resp.text: Thank you Gennie for sharing your experience and helping to spread the word about how amazing Austin is.  It's reviews like yours that help make us successful and we really appreciate it.

name: Kirsten Norton
text: My employer booked Kate Goodwin from stellar massages for our office and she was amazing. I really enjoyed my massage and would use stellar massages again.

text: Kate is fabulous. Takes her time and gets to know every customers individual needs. I have suggested her to not only friends but family and co-workers.

resp.text: Kate is rather amazing.  We at Stellar Massage pride ourselves into customizing your massage to your needs, which is why you sign up for a relaxation/deep tissue massage, because often what you want and need is a mixture.  We really appreciate you telling everyone about Kate.  It's people like you who help others make their decision about where to go, so you are not only helping us, but helping others as well.  We look forward to your next visit.

I really appreciate all of you at Stellar Massage, and I'm looking forward to coming back again, soon!!

.....
Last week, I received my first massage ever, and it was a wonderful experience! I was a bit nervous at first and did not know what to expect exactly, but I am so happy that I went! Kelly was my massage therapist, and I was amazed by the level of individual care and attention that I received from her. Furthermore, her extensive knowledge of the human body and massage therapy was impressive and enlightening to hear about.

I am going back for my next massage very soon as a birthday present to myself! :)

I'm very particular about who I hire and feedback like yours assures me that I made good choices. I'm happy that we've been able to help you and we look forward to seeing you again soon.

text: WOW!!! Patrick gave me a wonderful massage again.  Not only did he pin point and correct problem area, he then gave me a super massage to help with every day stress/tension.  If there is a heaven on earth, I was there after Patrick's massage.  I will be going back.

text: Have used most of the massage therapist here and they are all great

name: Scott Kilpatrick
text: While traveling, I found myself in desperate need of a massage due to stiffness from travel and being tense from the stress of sitting in a conference room all week. I was able to book an appointment with Jenae and she immediately got right to work on my problem areas and even identified some knots and sore spots I was not aware of. After the massage and a good night's rest, I felt restored and balanced. I highly recommend this business.

resp.text: Thank you Scott.  I'm happy I could help.  Hope to see you next time you're in town.

name: Joy Swartz
text: I go to Stellar Massage every time I visit my daughter.  It is the highlight of my trip and I'm not sure I'd be up to the drive home if I didn't.  I was loath to try anyone except Jenae, but due to timing I've had to and they are all wonderful! (I am still partial to Jenae).  They all took time to talk to me and get to know my needs for themselves and I feel like they all tailor the massage to my particular needs and what I like.  If you want a good massage, this is the place to go.

resp.text:
Thank you Joy.  It's always a pleasure having you visit. I'm glad we are able to make your visits easier.  We look forward to next time.

Jenae

name: William Lewis
text: Great experience. Definitely had lower back pain relief. Sally did a great job, gave me advice on ways to prevent what was causing my pain. Will be returning soon.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experience with Stellar Massage and Sally in particular.  She's new and your review will help people make an informed choice when looking for who to chose when they need pain relief.  Thank you so much, and we hope to see you back soon.

name: Tiki Torch
text: Belittling clients and rude customer service from the owner. **upate: I have seen the response from the owner, and I will let the consumer decide what they think* she said "anything that you bring up staff, they think it has been cleared with me" which is (in my opinion) not a good business plan. I asked for a $20 gift card (MY FIRST AND LAST TIME EVER ASKING FOR ONE) expecting to recieve a card that simply had $20 loaded on it, like normal, and her staff chose to give me $40 because of my usual discount. It is not my job as a new consumer to know what is and isn't allowed, and there is a very polite way to go about doing it, coming from a family that owns 3 very successful businesses, I don't think TEXTING ME IN A GROUP MESSAGE AT 1:09 A.M. accusing me of taking advantage of her is the way to do it. But if that's good customer service to you, then I redact my statement. Otherwise, I'd reccomend a massage therapist that brings more relaxation than stress to your life.

resp.text:
This is my daughter-in-law's brother's girlfriend whom I had allowed to come in to receive massage at half price. This is because I let her know that that courtesy did not extend to buying gift certificates to give to others.

Edited... I did not initially say she took advantage, only told her that the courtesy did not extend to gift certificates she gave away. After receiving a defensive reply saying she didn't ask for the discount I explained that she did not come in as a client, but on the same level as family members so the staff assume she has cleared it through me first and to please run it by me first in the future. Yes, I did include her boyfriend in the text because he was the one who asked if I would extend the FAMILY discount to her.

My error was extending the family discount too far to someone I didn't know and allowing this personal drama to cross over to business. I would gladly let it drop, but I feel I have to respond to this public posting.

name: Kaitlyn Long
text: Awesome massage by Kate! Highly recommend the deep tissue massage my sore muscles feel fantastic!

resp.text: Thank you Kaitlyn for sharing, so happy Kate was able to help you.

name: Shauna Hadley
text: Tried to call them to make an appointment and was put on hold for 10+ minutes. I tried calling back and they did it again for a total of over 20+ minutes. Apparently they are doing well enough that they don't need new clients.

resp.text:
**UPDATED 5/13/17. I have signed up for a directory service to give clients direct access to an appointment specialist or to me. Hopefully the recorded options won't just annoy people.

I apologize for the extended hold time.  I understand how frustrating it is to be left on hold and am so sorry you experienced it when calling us.  I contacted my answering service to find out why you were left on hold so long and to find out if this is a regular thing and I'm just now finding out about it.  What I found out is that what you experienced is not common.  I'll try to explain why it happened below.  Please note; it's an explanation, not an excuse.

The answering service was able to determine which number called twice and was left on hold, so I have your number, but I don't want to call you in case the call would be unwelcome.  I'd like to make it up to you by offering 30 minutes free to make up for the hold time.   Once again, I'm terribly sorry and will try to limit the chances of it happening again.

(1) Not all their operators can make appointments for us.  Our answering service does not just take messages,  they give information, make appointments, and take credit card information.  In order to keep errors down, they have certain people who are allowed to make appointments and take credit card info, so when you call and want more than information, and one of those people is on the phone, you will have to wait until one of them is free.

We keep our prices competitive with independents rather than spas by not paying for a receptionist.  Our clients have consistently said they'd prefer to wait 2 min on hold with our service than get my voicemail and have to wait for me to call back (The average hold time when one of our specialists is not available is 1.9 min.  Most of the time someone can take the call right away.)

(2)  They had a couple of our appointment specialists call in sick, so the pool of people who could take your appointment was reduced.

(3)  You called at 5:05:31 and 5:12:05.  Their peak call time is 4:30-5:30 and with several people out sick their hold time was longer than usual. As I said, I will try to make myself available during this time to reduce the likelihood of being placed on hold in the future.

Jenae

name: Chris Needham
text: Just a fantastic business. Well managed !

resp.text: Thank you for you review Chris. We're looking forward to your next visit.

name: Jonathan Floyd
text: First time massage...excellent experience. Very comfortable atmosphere and relieved so much tension...it's unreal.  Will be back and recommnending to others :-)  THANKS AGAIN!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful feedback and the email so I could fix the link to bring you here.  I'm glad I was able to make you feel better.  I look forward to your next visit....Jenae

name: aaron voyles
text: Sally was great. I left feeling much better than I have in a long time.

resp.text: Thank you Aaron for sharing your experience with Sally.  I'm glad she was able to help you and hope we will see you again soon.

name: Alan Moore
text: If you're looking for a team of extraordinarily skilled professionals who will help you feel better, this is the place to go. Whether for the occasional treat or recovering from an injury, they'll go above and beyond to help you.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words.  We're so happy you have had good experienced here and that you are part of our Stellar Massage Club.  We look forward to your next visit.

name: Libby Rogers
text: Very easy to schedule.  My therapist asked specific questions to determine my needs.  She did a combination of myofascial release and deep tissue.  She wa able to target my problem areas, provide relief and education to help me when day to day to decrease pain.  She was very professional. I would definitely recommend to someone new to massage or if you like deep tissue or have pain relief needs.

resp.text: Thank you Libby.  We try very hard to provide the best experience for each person and I really appreciate knowing that you were pleased with Kelly. We rely on feedback like yours to continue to grow our clientele and we greatly appreciate your sharing your experience here.

name: Bo Roper
text: I received a tandem massage from Jenae and April last week, and very much enjoyed it. They both were able to work deep and get to my problem spots that nobody has ever been able to work out before. They were also able to see how I work certain muscles, and the stresses they are under during the massage, which impressed me greatly. Especially April, in knowing the special circumstances with injuries I've had on my legs. I would highly recommend Stellar Massage to anyone, especially for deep tissue and neuromuscular therapy. If you tell them you want deep tissue, you're going to get an intense deep tissue massage. Which is exactly what I enjoy. I haven't tried them for a relaxation massage as of yet, but I plan on doing a couples massage with my wife very soon, and I'm certain it will be equally impressive.

resp.text: Thank you Bo, we were very happy to have you in.  It isn't very often we get to do a deep tissue tandem massage, and you certainly needed it! Feedback like yours is very important to us personally and to our business as it helps people choose a massage therapist and grow our clientele.  So, I'd like to thank you for your contribution in our expansion to a storefront next month!  I hope to see you and your wife very soon.

name: Deja Moore
text: I loved it Kate did.a great job.on me and my best friend we will definitely be going.back!

resp.text: She is quite wonderful.  I'm so glad you were happy.  I'll let Kate know you left her such a great review.  Thank you for letting people know how good she is, it will help her build her clientele here at Stellar Massage.

name: Lucynda Smith
text: I had a great Massage from Mary!!!  I highly recommend Stellar Massage!!!  This was my first visit but I will be back.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving feedback.  I'm so happy that you enjoyed your massage.  Mary is new to Stellar Massage and your letting people know how wonderful she is will be a great help in building her clientele.  It is greatly appreciated.

name: mia fiterman
text: got an appointment right away at a convenient time for ME...Chris gave a great massage and really focused on my problem tension areas.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving your review Mia.  I'm glad Chris was able to give you some relief.  I'll make sure he knows you left this review.  It always feels good to get a pat on the back and current feedback lets people know that we, and Chris, continue to give excellent service. Thank you so much.

name: Omotola A
text:
I have visited twice now, each time I am blown away by the knowledge and experience of the staff
As a healthcare worker I carry lots of my stress in my shoulders
these experts know what to do and how to treat my knots
I specifically recommend Katelynn and Chris

resp.text: Thank you Omotola for sharing your experience with Kate and Chris at Stellar Massage. I think if people could feel what we feel when we work on our health care providers they'd have a much higher appreciation of what YOU do for them. We are happy to have been able to help you.

name: Vance Gardner
text: Very professional.   I have recommended them to all my friends.

resp.text: Thank you Vance! It's regular clients like you that help us flourish. I know Chris enjoys having you in each month.  We appreciate your referrals and your feedback here and look forward to your next visit.

name: Adam Watkins
text: Best massage I have found in Birmingham, very friendly and easy to work with/schedule

resp.text: Thank you Adam.  We are very happy to have you, and thank you for joining the Stellar Massage Club.  We will see you again soon!

name: Danielle Ledet
text: Patrick was fantastic! Very professional and did a great job. I will def be back!

name: bala chandar
text:
I went to stellar massage couple of times and got an email requesting to give a feedback.

They are very good professional massage therapists.

My first massage session was with Jenae Jeffers and that was excellent(5/5).Also, she taught me few terminologies before and after massage like trigger points,how it functions,what follow ups required at home to make it better(salt bath etc.).Yes,the lessons are free.

I would recommend to opt Jenae for the people who wants a very strong massage and ok to bear a little pain and relax for the entire week.

My second session was with Meredyth as Jenae was busy on that day.I would rate 4/5 as i had a nice massage but not completely satisfied.I was expecting to get stronger massage like the one i got from Jenae. But i know she did her best.
If you are a soft person who expects smooth massage,tranquility,100% relaxation and deep sleep,Meredyth is the right choice.

They are awesome not business oriented and i will visit them again.

-Bala.

resp.text: Thank you Bala for leaving honest feedback for us.  It's feedback like yours that helps people choose who they want to visit for relief or relaxation.  While I hire based on the deep tissue massage a therapist gives, I do not want every therapist to be the same, so it's good for people to know the differences between the therapists they can choose from.  We have more detailed information about each therapist on the about page of our website.  We look forward to your next visit.

name: Kerry Upton
text: Kate was my massage therapist and she was great!

resp.text: Thank you for helping to spread the word about how wonderful Kate is.  I'll make sure she see's this.  I know she'll appreciate knowing you gave her a shout out.

name: bilal3700
text: Two massages, mediocre at best. Overly hyped but could not deliver.

resp.text: You have not been back since your 3* review 6 months ago under the name Bilal Abd-Alrahman saying it was "good massage, not inviting, basically forgettable."  When you left your prior review I did not mention how rude you were to your therapist or ask if perhaps you were unhappy for the same reason you left 3* during the same time period for Relax Place Massage in Chesterfield, MO where you noted it was "good massage, but no happy ending." Leaving a 2nd bad review under a different name 6 months later... I'm not so inclined to be politic.  I've taken screen shots in case you delete them and will be reporting you to Google.  (Later) Of course Google did nothing

name: Bilal
text: Good massage, not inviting. Basically forgettable.

resp.text: I'm sorry you weren't so pleased with this last massage you received. While I'm confident regarding the quality of all our therapists, they all have different styles, so it's common to prefer one over another.

It's current feedback like yours that helps people make their choices and helps build not just Stellar Massage's, but each therapists clientele.  We look forward to your next visit.

name: Martha Slay
text: I love this nail place. I've been going there for several years. Fantastic place

name: Prachi Patel
text: Very nice staff, good quality of service and very easy to communicate in this quiet and serene environment. The waiting line was not too long and when you go for the first time you get a nice little discount. The fact that there were people waiting for this salon shows that it is well known by the locals to be a salon worth your time. I highly recommend this place!

name: Ramblin Rose
text: Made an appointment, arrived 10 minutes early. After waiting 20 minutes was seated in a pedicure chair. Sat there for another 30 minutes when I was told I would have to wait a few more minutes while she took care of the person who had an appointment 15 minutes after me was taken care of. I walked out and will never return.

name: Julie Cruz
text: Probably the best pedicure ever. I judge all my pedicures on how they handle my ingrown nails and my scarred foot. The gentleman who did my pedicure and a very basic manicure was very knowledgeable. He recognized my problems before I even said anything, he gave great advice on my very dry cuticles and he didn’t rush or try to pretend he got my ingrowns when he didn’t. I wish I lived here, this would be my go-to salon.

name: Joy Moore
text:
Other reviews said quick service.. which is fine but nail polish should not be rushed.  That was the entire experience-rushed.   when they "ordered" me to go dry my nails under the lamp they plopped my purse in my lap and walked away. I had to move the arm of the chair, carry my purse, phone and water bottle to the drying station by myself.  Mind you, I have wet polish on my hands.   Needless to say, I bumped the nail and they had to reapply.

When they painted the fingernails they applied the layers of polish so quick that after one day it started to peel right off the nails.   Never had this experience at any other salon but then again, they rush you through the process.  They want everyone to buy gels so guess they don't care about the customers that want regular polish.   Very disappointed it did not even make it 24 hours before it started to peel right off.

name: NaTasha Sherwin
text: Mani was terrible.  I do a better job at home.

name: Gloria Lucas
text:
I went to Purity Nails yesterday. While I was having my pedicure done, the loud television began to lose signal and make an awful loud, buzzing noise. After a few minutes when I realized that they weren’t planning on correcting the problem, I kindly asked if they would mind changing the channel. I was told that all the channels do that and eventually it would start working again. I then asked if they could turn down the volume in the meantime, to which I was told that “it would be too quiet in here.”

I will NEVER go to this salon again.

name: Michelle Sanders
text: Quick and friendly service.

name: Allison Carnes
text: This is my favorite place to get my nails done. They are always friendly and I am always happy with my nails.

name: Becca Bearden
text: I got a man i don't know his name but he rushed through didn't get all the old polish off. My nails are bumpy. Didn't clean up his lines, i got a simple french. He huffed and puffed when i asked him to so something. Didn't cut my cuticles. And wouldn't stop watching the game not paying attention at all.

name: Sofia Brown
text: I went here 2 weeks ago and the staff was very friendly. I got the gel nails and they came out extremely straight and very beautiful. I leave all of my things in the car that way I know not to carry things around with the wet fingernail polish on. They even had me pay before they painted my nails that way it would be easier. I was looking for a color that was like a dark maroon and when I picked out the Polish I thought it was it was the wrong color. The lady who was painting my nails offered to go pick the color out for me and when she did it came out to be the color I wanted. There are extremely helpful and like I said my nails came out great. I will be coming in later today to get them redone because now I want french tips! To the negative reviews on this place your complaints seem to be your fault. For example it's your fault that you didn't check the expiration date on the gift certificate. And it's your fault that you brought in a water bottle your purse your phone and all other kinds of stuff that you expected them to cater and carry for you when you should have left those items in the vehicle.

text: This is a horrible place. My 5 year old daughter received a gift certificate for her birthday and we picked today for my Mother's Day pedicure and to redeem her gc. They get is started and begin on my daughter then come up to me with the gift certificate and a part torn off that shows it is expired. I was very angry because they started on my daughter before their detective work. They said they would do her nails but when she began crying they said they would do both nails and toes. It was not a full pedicure. So, the $27 her gift giver paid went straight to thei pockets. Buyer and customer beware. Their 6 month expiration appears to be a scam to steal people's money. Do not go here. Never. Do not buy gift certificates. Needless to say I walked out of my chair and did not get my Mother's Day pedicure. My daughter had to witness my argument with the owner/manager instead of having a special time with me.

Kanina,

We apologize for the online booking issues. Our website is currently undergoing a complete redesign and this may be part of the problem. I'll have to discuss with the design team. We do have a text option if you'd like. Simply text your request to our main number 205-905-7676 and someone will get back with you. Thanks!

name: Arin P
text:
The service was HORRIBLE I TELL YOU!!! Whatever you do, do not go to Moon day Spa in trussville. I called in to make what I thought was an appointment for a Brazilian wax, she told me to be there @ 4. I arrived at 3:55. Once entering the building I was not greeted or asked did I need help or to sign in. I patiently waited because I know it’s prom season and she will
Have a lot of clients. So eventually it was my turn up. As I entered the room I informed her that I was a first timer and I didn’t understand the process. She asked me to take my pants off and lay on the table. Once laying there she put me in the butterfly position, she took the baby powder and just sprayed it from the rotor to the tutor #literally and started placing HOT WAX all over my vagina area. At that moment I knew this was about to regret this decision. I never seen/heard where you place HOT WAX all over the area at once. Then she began pulling away. I let her know that it was really painful and i don’t think it suppose to be this painful. She let me know my hair was course and it takes to long to do it in small sections which I was accustomed to from hearing other describe their experiences.. I allowed her to pull a total of 7 times before I called a quits! Once I let her know to stop she Rudely told me that I would have to get the remaining wax(on my lips) of myself and to get it off use Baby oil. I told her that I was afraid to place my under garments back on because the wax will stick to them and that will be another tragedy I will have to deal with! She told me to put a napkin right there, I declined them she threw me a baby wipe and walked out the room!! This is by far the worse thing to encounter. I forgot to tell y’all she pulled so hard that I was bleeding in multiple places on my bikini line. This is a sensitive area and I entrusted her to take her time and get the job done in a professional manner. I’ve never encountered anything like this in my life whatever y’all do, do not go to PAM in trussville @MOON DAY SPA!

text: Getting an eyelash fill was never so unprofessional and disappointing. She sat me in a hair cutting chair, used low grade tape on my eyes and the service was nearly unbearable. She left me twice to tend to other people, for long periods of time. I tried to ask what was going on and she got mad and told me too "just wait." I waited a bit longer, then told her I'd like to leave. She came back over to me and explained that shed be right with me, that this other lady was actually scheduled first. I said she was being rude and I didn't trust her to do my eyelashes. She assured me she would do well. The end results were terrifying, I'm on vacation and am not the least bit happy with the lashes. I had also asked her if they were silk, to match my current ones and she said yes. Come to find out she used mink and they're whispey, they don't align with what I had originally and they curl in every direction. I'm upset about them. Lastly she did not wash her hands when she went back and forth between other customers and me, and after she closed a transaction. Worst experience ever.

name: Maesha Twyner
text:
I went here based on the reviews I saw and I love shopping in the Trussville Pinnacle square area and I am looking for a new waxing place.  Disclaimer: I recently moved from Atlanta, and love my previous eyebrow threading/wax location (Unique Threading and Waxing), so I held this place to high standards. The prices are similar.

I went for a Brazilian and underarm wax.
The interior is subpar - their needs to be an update. The lighting is dim and it made me feel as though it was not clean. The waxing table is made of faux leather (which is not a problem) but it was pealing. She placed some paper on the table, but I did have to ask her to place more to cover the entire table prior to me getting onto the table.  She stayed in the room while I was getting undressed - which was kind of weird.  The floor was dirty, it needed to be swept. There was long hair as if someone combed there hair there or perhaps the room had been used for salon clients?

The waxing was going well. Painful, but not out of the ordinary.  She did not double dip. She gave me a pair of gloves to assist, but during the processed I noticed that I was bleeding. She had ripped some of my skin off during the Brazilian!  I have had many waxes, but this was the first time I had ever had that happen. I noticed that she was applying wax to large areas at a time then removing smaller portions. I've never seen it done that way, and perhaps that's what caused it.

She kept the same bloody gloves on while touching the other products like the powder and removed them after I had grimaced. The underarm wax was fine. But this was my first and last time going to this location. She stayed in the room while I got dressed, but then left to go to the register. I didn't see her wipe down any of the items she touched or the table.  Some of the reviews say they are unsanitary - this is correct in my opinion.

I'm not quite sure how it got such great ratings. I suspect that someone is removing bad ratings, or maybe I'm just unlucky.

text: I recently got into mink lashes a couple of months ago. Within that moment, I had a feeling that I was not going to be pleased because something about the young lady made me feel like she was inexperienced. Long story short, the young lady did not apply the pads correctly so my eyelids were glued together after she finished with the application. Moon came over and had to pry my eyes apart...she also had to remove the lashes that were left and start the process over again. My eyes were hurting extremely and very irritated...so much so that she could not finish and asked me to come back another day once my eyes recovered. Not to mention that alot of my natural eyelashes were ripped out when she pryed my eyes open! This happened two weeks ago and my eyes still have not recovered! name: Sara Justice
text:
I went in for a microblading session (I purchased a Groupon) and one of the five brazilians that I purchased as a set on Groupon. I started out getting the eyebrows done. I had them threaded for the first time ever. Honestly, this hurt a ton less than waxing (but I have a high pain tolerance). Afterwards, we drew on the exact shape of brow that I wanted, numbed the outmost layer of skin, and set to work. It was a bit painful to draw the outline in, but afterwards my eyebrows were completely numbed to begin the full fill in process. It did not hurt at all at this point, just felt a weird scratching sensation. I would say the least pleasurable part of this experience was the scratching sound/feeling. My brows turned out exactly how I wanted. I now have cut my makeup time down to about 10 minutes tops. I am excited to see my brows fade over time and see how they turn out.

As for the waxing, I did not see anything unsanitary about the process. The woman who did my wax did not double dip the wax stick. Instead, she placed the wax she used on me in a smaller container, from the large melting pot, using a clean spoon. The only part I did not enjoy about the waxing was that they did not use numbing spray like my previous esthetician and they did not fully remove all of the wax residue afterwards, which left me feeling sticky.

I also got mink eyelash extensions for the first time, just to try them out. My eyelashes feel beautiful. I definitely recommend getting them, but I would say try to keep yourself awake. It is very easy to get relaxed and fall asleep, but then you might jolt yourself awake like I did and end up with a little stinging sensation in your eye. But I loved the end result. My lashes are naturally straight, but now they are wonderfully curly and full.

I was charged for the threading, which I thought was included in the microblading, so that came as small shock. However, even though I did not purchase the lash extension on Groupon, Moon honored the Groupon price. I went to the Trussville location, which was extremely clean and convenient. I will be trying out the Galleria location for my follow up waxes.

name: Eric Luffman
text: I am huge on surprises! So I purchased a very expensive perfect package for my girl as a surprise Valentine's day present at this location bc ive sent her here once before and she seemed to enjoy it. Well the lady at the desk inquired on who it was for and apparently submitted the information under her name where as MY email confirmation went directly to my girl, where she called me informing me she knew my plans for her, spoiling the surprise!!! That should have never happened! I then called and explained my irritation and informed them I was coming for a refund. They called me back like it was no biggy like cool we can just refund this over the phone for you rather than saying hey i'm sorry is there any way we can make this right for you! I'm a funny, chill laid back dude, but if you ruin a surprise, that is my one and only immediate heartbreak bc that ruins the joy of spending lots of money to be able to see the expression on your womans face of how happy she is. Presents are for the givers and for the receivers bc we both enjoy feeling the happiness of THE SURPRISE!! Please resolve this issue, bc i'm a man of morality bc now my woman is upset with me bc I refunded the package but I simply can NOT do business with folks that aren't in it for the satisfaction of those spending their hard earned money! So now, I had Valentine's all planned out perfect to the T, I no longer have the "kaboom" gift available, and now there is all this negative energy between me and my woman bc I know she still wants the package but I can not allow it bc the surprise was so important to me i absolutely had to have my money back so that this place would know and preferably remember that they ruined something for two special people! I wouldn't dare ask for something free, I would feel bad for taking anything not earned, but as a man that runs  a business, I make free offers every day to ensure customer satisfaction and that they come back!! Moral of my story, do what is right, and right what you wronged!

When she was done I was getting dressed and looked at my phone for the time and realized it was only 10:48......  I won’t be going back. name: Kelsie Verble
text: PLEASE DONT GET YOUR NAILS DONE HERE! I went here because they take Bama cash and I didn’t have money for nails. I got a fill for my acrylics with gel nail polish and they look absolutely warped. I’m literally embarrassed to go out in public and I don’t have the money to get them fixed. I was too nervous to tell them I hated it because the lady that did my nails was so nice. But this just isn’t it.

name: emi tyra
text: LOVE this place. Top-notch services, expertly skilled staff (special shout out to Morgan!), the personnel always accommodating and helpful. The site itself is gorgeous; the atmosphere, exquisite. Plus, Dr. Bunch is obviously just the best ever. Highly recommend!

name: Karli Guyther
text: I tried the ear candling and got a major ear infection. I also got a fungus from the nail salon twice. The pedicurist told me that it was "normal." The only good thing about this salon is the massage therapists.

name: Francisco godinez
text: Great place. Super nice people. Everything so clean.

name: Catie Cavell
text: Petra has changed my skin forever. Before I had major problems with cystic acne that even left me with open cuts on my face. Now I can go out in public with no makeup on and get compliments on how clear my skin looks.

name: josett Hinton
text: My boyfriend purchased me a gift card for Valentine's Day. I went, which was more than a small distance, to Spa Bella to find out they had lost the transaction. My boyfriend kept calling to try to resolve the matter. Everyone there we talk to said they couldn't find our name including the manager. So my boyfriend had to go to the bank for a bank statement to prove he had made the purchase. I receive a call saying someone had spelled the name wrong  and I can come back to use my certificate. At this time I'm frustrated. I requested a refund and was told I couldn't receive one when they made the mistake. Me and my boyfriend spent time and gas trying resolve the issue when I think they could have resolved it better and in a timely matter.

name: Kelley
text: They're very welcoming! I got a full hour Swedish massage. You fill out a form beforehand stating where you'd like them to focus on and where you don't want to be touched. The only negative part of my experience is that the three places I specifically wrote I didn't want to be touched, my massage therapist touched. I didn't exactly feel comfortable telling her during my massage cuz I wrote it down on the form which I had handed to her. It made parts of my massage tense for me.

name: Dana Standifer
text: Amazing place for facial, spa treatments, pedicures! The ambiance is warm and so soothing. Very kind and professional associates.

name: Emily Harrelson
text: I love this place! They have wonderful massage techs. Also they do men's waxing, which is hard to find in Tuscaloosa.

name: Laura Archibald
text: I got a massage as a surprise gift for my Birthday. My daughter is awesome. It was my first time at Bella, and I loved it. Nice atmosphere and staff. Just what I needed.

name: John Riddle
text:
Amazing experience.
Wonderful staff
Highly recommend
We went for a couples massage and every aspect from start to finish was above expectation

name: LaShandra Hatcher
text: Carlita did a great pedicure for me! I've always gotten great massages from here and I really enjoy the ambience and amenities while you wait.

name: Kelley Mallone
text: Gorgeous place! Everything about this spa is beautiful and well thought out. The staff is so nice and the services are spectacular!!

name: Andrea Shepard
text: I have gotten many deep tissue massages in my life and none of them even compare to kami's massages. I work a very hig paced stressful job which causes knots in my back and kami is the only person who has given me a massage and I walked out feeling like I had a brand new back. She is worth every penny and I won't be changing spas. All around amazing experience.

resp.text: Thank you Mayra! Your results are proof that dedication to skincare routines and professional treatments equal success skincare outcomes. Keep up the good work!

text:
There isn't enough words to express the quality and service in each service provided.
I have had many massages and facials and Pennies from Heaven is better than any Spa on 5th Ave. In NYC by far hands down your go to place for all your beauty needs!!! So blessed I found you

name: Roman Cabrera (Red wolf)
text: I love this place is very good and you feel like whit family i will return every month or twice at month

name: Anthony harville
text: Two thumbs way way up! Scheduled an appointment while I was in town working and she worked my back problems out. Great personality and even better hand! Thanks again!!!

name: Crystal Miller
text: I went in to buy a gift certificate for my husband. The girls were very helpful, knowledgeable, and very kind. The atmosphere was very relaxing, clean, and serene. I'll definitely go back to get treatment for myself!

name: A Morgan
text: This place truly lives up to its name! Had such a great experience with all the services they offer. The staff is knowledgeable, kind, and caring! The prices are unbelievably affordable. You leave this place restored and feeling more confident when you leave. I have a lot of acne and penny gave me a new face I could be proud of! I work on the computer all day, and the fire cupping relived all of the tension in my shoulders. The foot detox and salt cave overall eased my anxiety and gave me a sense of calmness I didn't have before. I have found my new happy place! Thank you, girls, again for a fabulous relaxing time! I will be back!

name: Brandy Dupree
text: I went to Penny for an authentic HydraFacial. She explained the entire process to me, and showed me every step of the facial. I am beyond amazed at my results!! I’ve never had a facial like this before including the extractions. My skin is smoother and clearer! The best part was seeing the “gunk” that came from my face. I highly recommend using Penny’s From Heaven for a HydraFacial, as well as other services. Penny is very kind, knowledgeable, and caring. She takes time to listen and provide quality treatment. She’s the best around!

name: Tina Burt
text: Penny and her staff go beyond normal spa services. Nice atmosphere and so relaxing. Penny is very attentive to your needs and takes extra care to please her clients.

name: eternalinctattoos Wayne K
text: Salt cave in my opinion was horrible and very cold. luckily my wife didn't have to pay for any of her stuff. I just had to pay $45 to practically freeze and listen to a repetitive anoying sound  of it running. I feel no different of course. My opinion this place is a gimmick. Overpriced, very boring and just excuses when I said something about the Salt cave not doing a thing. I wouldn't even go back if it was totally free for any of it. Its like a country store with over priced products. Huge waste of time. What a Joke. If my wife liked this place then she will  be going without me and not be dragging me into this lame spa.

resp.text:
We respect your opinion. However, as a Licensed Esthetics Instructor that researched extensively the salt cave benefits prior to constructing our specially designed Salt Cave. I would like to share facts regarding the salt cave with you.
•	Taking wellness to another level, halotherapy (a.k.a. Salt Therapy) is similar to spending time in the salty sea air, which offers many more benefits than “sleeping” on the beach.
•	Ancient Healers and Philosophers recommended salt inhalation for the respiratory system and health problems. Dry salt therapy originates from speleotherapy (cave therapy). This was discovered in Poland where workers exhibited fewer respiratory illnesses.   There are thousands of salt rooms in Europe and beyond.
•	The benefits of Salt Therapy are wide-ranging.  Salt levels affect our cell activity, energy, and blood sugar levels.  A natural disinfectant, salt is antimicrobial, and antibacterial.  Salt comes in empty processed forms or healthier pure sea salts that contain 84 elements and trace elements found in the human body.  Dry salt air is more powerful than moist air.
•	Negatively charged ions in salt improve our health and mood.  Inhaling particles may reduce inflammation and mucus in the lungs, improving respiratory conditions such as asthma, allergies, bronchitis, sinus congestion, and C.O.P.D.   We have seen physical proof of many of these conditions improving through our loyal clients.
•	The calming and detoxifying effects of halotherapy can support the immune, nervous and lymphatic systems.   Additional benefits are reduced stress and headaches, increased energy and better sleep patterns.  Salt ions purify the air and may increase lung capacity and reduce physical ailments for adults, children and athletes.  A series of treatments are recommended to keep the body healthy during flu or allergy season.    So, this is why we offer packages to continue your treatments.
•	A session will last 45 minutes. For mild to moderate respiratory conditions, 10 to 12 sessions are recommended, depending on individual results. For best results, sessions should be 4 to 5 times per week.   Since everyone responds differently to therapy, this is provided as an average upon which to gauge your personal experience.   After the initial set of treatments, you should follow up at least once per week.

The Salt Cave temperature was accurate and is temp and humidity controlled by its individual unit. Blankets were provided in the salt cave for your comfort in the temp controlled room.   To be freezing in there, it was your decision not to use the provided amenities.

While your wife enjoyed her massage that was paid for via gift certificate, you chose to participate in a service as well.    Our company policy states that Gift Certificates are only used for the person that they were purchased for.  Therefore, your salt session could not be added to her gift certificate.   The remainder of her certificate will be for her to relax and enjoy other services.

We have been in business over 25 years, and our reputation speaks for itself. Our moto has always been “Where You Come To Get Away”.  We strive to maintain an environment and technology free zone that offers an opportunity for our clients to get away from the stresses of everyday life. It is your opinion that you found this “boring”. Following your treatment yesterday, you enjoyed our front porch swing, while on your cell phone. You expressed to me, that you understood the concept of the salt, because while you were living in Florida you “spent many nights sleeping on the beach”.

In response to your review, We pray that you will take this reply positively and learn the facts of the salt cave and our business rather than negatively portraying our business.

God Bless,
Penny Ogle,
Licensed Esthetics Instructor
Owner

name: R Kelly
text: I normally go to Decatur to get my lashes done. I work in jasper so decided to try this place. Huge mistake. I’m only on day 2 and they are coming off. They hurt and glue is everywhere. I paid $40 for this. In Decatur I pay $35 for brows and lashes to get done and my lashes last 2 weeks. Waste of time and money.

name: Samone Brooks
text: Thought I would try their individual lashes. Glue was EVERYWHERE!!!! Super thick on my eyes and looked a hot mess!! I ask the lady to remove them before I left and she refused to. Kept telling me to leave them on a couple days!! No thank you!! I removed soon as I got home!! They definitely don’t know what they are doing when it comes to lashes!!

name: Brittney Steinbrecher
text: I got my lashes done here and they turned out awful I will not be going back the glue was so thick and is not supposed to touch your skin its supposed to be on your natural lashes only but it wasnt and they got irritated amd they hurt to even blink the lady was rude and it only took about 15 to 30 minutes when it should tale 2 to 3 hours done right so I wemt to a professional and it took her about 30 to 45 minutes just to get all the glue off and wash my eyelashes so they didn't get infected

name: Dezarae David
text: I got henna done and the lady asked for a reference picture and still messed up. And I purposely picked a simple one!!! Never ever go here !

name: Keta Dowdell
text: I've been here twice now and won't be coming back. Every time I come it seems like the woman working there has an attitude. The first time I came to get my chin threaded, she insisted I got waxed first, even though I told her I had sensitive skin. When I said I'd just leave if it was too much trouble, she rolled her eyes at me and gestured for me to sit down, then claimed that any hairs that weren't removed would be my fault. Today I got the wax with no complaints (although she still didn't, get most of the hairs) but now my eyebrows are ROUND AT THE FRONTS! I'm very upset and they won't be getting my business.

name: Ataya Vandiver
text: Great customer service

name: Mackenzie Abbott
text: If I could give zero stars I would. DO NOT GET EYELASH EXTENSIONS IN THE JASPER LOCATION. They look horrible and not only do they look horrible but she does them wrong. I decided to get them removed bc I hated them so much and she couldn’t even get them all herself. My eyes are swollen and in pain. I’ve tried everything myself and can’t get them off either. Not only that but I was in there for two hours waiting in between other people that had walked in AFTER me to get what they needed done before I got fully treated. I’m beyond upset.
